Ɛnna Rabsake no gyinaeɛ, na ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu Yuda kasa mu sɛ: Montie ɔhenkɛseɛ, Asiriahene no asɛm!
Sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie: Mommma Hesekia nnaadaa mo, na ɔrentumi nnye mo;
nso mommma Hesekia mmma mommfa mo ho nnto AWURADE so sɛ: Gyeɛ ara na AWURADE bɛgye yɛn, wɔremfa kuro yi nhyɛ Asiriahene nsa.
Monntie Hesekia! Na sɛ Asiriahene seɛ nie: Mo ne me nni asomdwoeɛsɛm, na momfiri mmra me nkyɛn; ɛno na mo mu biara bɛdi ɔno ara ne bobe, ne ɔno ara ne borɔdɔma na wanom ɔno ara n’abura mu nsuo
akɔsi sɛ mɛba mabɛfa mo akɔ asase a ɛte sɛ mo asase yi soɔ, ayuo ne nsa asase, aduane ne bobe nturo asase.
Na mommma Hesekia nnto mo tɛkyerɛmakyene sɛ: AWURADE bɛgye yɛn: Amanaman anyame mu biara agye n’asase afiri Asiriahene nsam pɛn anaa?
Ɛhe na Hamat ne Arpad anyame no wɔ? Ɛhe na Sefarwaim anyame no wɔ, wɔagye Samaria afiri me nsam?
Nsase yi anyame nyinaa mu hwannom na wɔagye wɔn asase afiri me nsam, na AWURADE rebɛgye Yerusalem afiri me nsam?
Na wɔyɛɛ komm, na wɔammua no asɛm biara, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhene asɛm a ɔhyɛeɛ ne sɛ: Mommmua no!
Ɛnna Hilkia ba Eliakim a ɔdi efie no soɔ no, ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Sebna ne Asaf ba Ɔsɛnkaefoɔ Yoa de wɔn ntadeɛ a wɔasusuane mu baa Hesekia nkyɛn bɛkaa Rabsake no nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no.
Na ɛbaa sɛ Ɔhene Hesekia teeɛ no, ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu, na ɔfiraa ayitoma, na ɔsii mu kɔɔ AWURADE fie.
Na ɔsomaa Eliakim a ɔdi efie no soɔ no ne Ɔtwerɛfoɔ Sebna ne asɔfoɔ no mu mpanin a wɔfirafira ayitoma kɔɔ Amos ba Odiyifoɔ Yesaia nkyɛn,
na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ Hesekia seɛ nie: Ahohiahia ne asotwe ne abususɛnka da ne nnɛ, na mma aduru awotwaa ano, na ahoɔden nni hɔ a wɔde bɛwo wɔn.

Ebia AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛte Rabsake no a ne wura Asiriahene asoma no sɛ ɔmmɛsopa Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nsɛm no, na nsɛm a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ateɛ no nti, watwe n’aso; enti ma wo mpaebɔ so ma nkaeɛ a wɔwɔ hɔ no.
Na Ɔhene Hesekia nkoa no baa Yesaia nkyɛn,
na Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ monka nkyerɛ mo wura nie: Sɛdeɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Nsuro nsɛm a woteeɛ a Asiriahene nkoa de abɛya me no.
Hwɛ, me na mede honhom bi bɛhyɛ ne mu, na wate asɛm bi, na wasane akɔ n’asase so, na mama no atɔ nkrantɛ ano, n’asase so.
Na Rabsake no sanee, na ɔkɔtoo Asiriahene sɛ ɔne Libna reko, na wate sɛ watu afiri Lakis.
Na ɔtee Etiopiahene Tirhaka nka sɛ: Watu ne wo rebɛko. Na ɔteeɛ no, ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ baa Hesekia nkyɛn sɛ:
Sɛ monkɔka nkyerɛ Yudahene Hesekia nie: Mma wo Nyankopɔn a wode wo ho to ne soɔ no nnaadaa wo sɛ: Wɔremfa Yerusalem nhyɛ Asiriahene nsa.
Hwɛ, wo ara woate deɛ Asiria ahemfo ayeyɛ nsase nyinaa asɛe wɔn pasapasa no, na wo na wɔbɛyi woɔ anaa?
Amanaman a m’agyanom asɛe wɔn no anyame no gyee wɔn? Gosan, Haran, Resef ne Edenfoɔ a wɔwɔ Talasar no?
Ɛhe na Hamathene ne Arpadhene ne Sefarwaim kuro ne Hena ne Iwahene no wɔ?
Na Hesekia gyee nwoma no abɔfoɔ no nsam, na ɔkenkanee, na ɔforo kɔɔ AWURADE fie; na Hesekia trɛɛ mu AWURADE anim.
Na Hesekia bɔɔ AWURADE mpaeɛ sɛ:
Asafo AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn a wote Kerubim soɔ, wo nko ne Onyankopɔn, asase so ahennie nyinaa so; wo na woyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase.
Brɛ w’aso ase, AWURADE, na tie! Bue w’ani, AWURADE, na hwɛ! na tie Sanaherib nsɛm a wasoma de abɛsopa Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nyinaa.
Ɛwom, AWURADE, Asiria ahemfo asɛe aman no nyinaa ne wɔn nsase,
na wɔatoto wɔn anyame agu ogya mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnyɛ anyame, na ɛyɛ onipa nsa ano adwuma, dua ne ɔboɔ nko, na wɔasɛe wɔn.
Na afei, AWURADE, yɛn Nyankopɔn, gye yɛn firi ne nsam, na asase so ahennie nyinaa nhunu sɛ wo nko ne AWURADE.
Ɛnna Amos ba Yesaia soma maa wɔkɔɔ Hesekia nkyɛn sɛ: Sɛdeɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn seɛ nie: Deɛ wobɔɔ me ɛho mpaeɛ wɔ Asiriahene Sanaherib ho no,
yei ne asɛm a AWURADE aka ne ho:

block_quote.content: Ɔbaabunu Sion babaa no
bu w’animtia si wo atwetweɛ;
w’akyiri na Yerusalem babaa
rewoso ne tire.
Hwan na woasopa no na woaya no?
Na hwan so na woama wo nne soɔ
na wɔama w’ani atra wo ntɔn?
Wode atia Israel Kronkronni no.
Wonam wo nkoa so asopa AWURADE
aka sɛ: Mede me nteaseɛnam dodoɔ
maforo makɔ mmepɔ atifi,
Lebanon mu nohoa tɔnn;
na matwitwa ne ntweneduro atentene
ne ne pepeaa a ɛyɛ fɛ no agu,
na makɔ makɔduru ne mmepɔ a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri no so,
ne ne kwaeɛbirentuo mu.
Me na matutu mmura
manom emu nsuo,
na mede me nammuromu wee
Misraim nsubɔntene nyinaa.
Wonteeɛ
sɛ mehyɛ metoo hɔ akyɛ,
tete mmerɛ mu na mehyehyɛɛ no saa?
Afei na mama no aba mu,
sɛ ma afasuo mu nkuro no
nnanedane akurofo akuakuo,
na emufoɔ a wɔahodwo
no ho adwiri wɔn, na wɔn ani awu
na wɔadanedane sɛ mfofowa so nhahan
ne wira mono,
adan atifi wira ne ayuo
a ɛnnya mmaa ne ho soɔ na adwan.
Na menim w’asetena
ne korɔ ne ne ba
ne dam a wobɔ no me soɔ no.
Ɛsiane sɛ wobɔ me so dam
na wo dwɛɛbɔ aforo abɛduru m’aso mu nti,
mede me kaa bɛhyɛ wo hwenem
na mede me manniamfrɛ ato w’anomu,
na masane wo afa kwan a
wonam so baeɛ no so akɔ.

verse.content: Na yei nyɛ wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ: Afe yi mu, monni ntwakaeɛ a ɛfifiriiɛ, na afe a ɛtɔ so mmienu no mu moadi deɛ ɛbɛfifiri akyire aba no, na afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mu no, mongu na montwa, na montɛ bobe nturo, na monni mu aba.
Na Yuda fie mu nkaeɛ a wɔafiri mu afire no, wɔbɛgye nhini bio, na wɔaso aba;
na Yerusalem na nkaeɛ bi bɛfire, na wɔn a wɔafiri mu afire no afiri Sion bepɔ so, asafo AWURADE ninkuntwe na ɛbɛyɛ yei.
Enti sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka no Asiriahene ho nie: Ɔremma kuro yi mu, na ɔrento agyan mma ha, na ɔremfa ɛkyɛm mmɛhyia no, na ɔrenhɔre epie ntia no.
Ɔkwan a ɔnam so baeɛ no so na ɔnam bɛsane akorɔ, na kuro yi deɛ, ɔrenhyɛne mu, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Na mɛwa kuro yi agye no, me ara ne m’akoa Dawid ntira.
Ɛnna AWURADE bɔfoɔ firi kɔkumm Asiria nsraban mu nnipa mpemha aduɔwɔtwe nnum; na wɔsɔree anɔpa no, na hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa yɛ afunu.
Na Asiriahene Sanaherib tu sii mu sanee, na ɔkɔtenaa Ninewe.
Na ɔresɔre wɔ ne nyame Nisrok fie no, ne mma Adramelek ne Sareser de nkrantɛ kumm no, na wɔfirii mu dwane kɔɔ Ararat asase so; na ne ba Esar-Hadon sii n’ananmu dii hene.
Nna no mu no, Hesekia yaree owuyareɛ, na Amos ba Odiyifoɔ Yesaia baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Hyɛ wo fie nsamanseɛ, na worebɛwu, na worennya nkwa.
Ɛnna Hesekia danee n’ani kyerɛɛ ɔfasuo, na ɔbɔɔ AWURADE mpaeɛ sɛ:
Ao, AWURADE, kae sɛdeɛ manante w’anim nokorɛ mu, ne akoma a ɛdi mu mu, na mayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ w’ani so. Na Hesekia suu esu kɛseɛ.
Ɛnna AWURADE asɛm baa Yesaia nkyɛn sɛ:
Kɔ na kɔka kyerɛ Hesekia sɛ: Sɛdeɛ AWURADE, w’agya Dawid Nyankopɔn, seɛ nie: Mate wo mpaebɔ, mahunu wo nisuo; hwɛ, mede mfeɛ dunum bɛto wo nna so,
na mɛgye wo ne kuro yi afiri Asiriahene nsam, na mabɔ kuro yi ho ban.
Na yei nyɛ wo AWURADE nsam nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, sɛ AWURADE bɛyɛ adeɛ a waka no:
Hwɛ, merebɛsane owia dɔn so sunsum a owia ma no sianee Ahas owia dɔn soɔ no mama no akɔ akyire nkyekyɛmu du.
Na owia sanee n’akyi owia dɔn no so nkyekyɛm du a asiane dada no.
Yudahene Hesekia nsɛm a ɔyareeɛ, na ɔnyaa ne yadeɛ mu nkwa no, ɔtwerɛɛ nie:

block_quote.content: Me deɛ, mekaa sɛ:
Me nna mu kommyɛ mu
na merekɔ Asamando aboboano,
wɔregye me nsam me mfeɛ nkaeɛ.
Mese: Merenhunu AWURADE bio,
wɔ ateasefoɔ asase so;
merenhunu nnipa bio,
wɔn a wɔte wiase no mu.
Wɔayi me tenabea ma no afiri me ho kɔ
sɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ ntomadan,
mebobɔ me nkwa sɛ ɔtomanwomfoɔ;
anka ɔrebɛtwa me afiri asadua no mu:
Worewie me da koro adesaeɛ.
Mesui pɛɛ mmoa kɔsii anɔpa,
ɔbubuu me nnompe nyinaa sɛ gyata:
Worewie me da koro adesaeɛ.
Mesii apini sɛ asomfenakatakyi, sɛ asukɔnkɔn,
medii abooboo sɛ aburuburo;
m’aniwa yɛɛ samoo hwɛɛ ɔsoro sɛ:
O AWURADE, me ho kyere me, di ma me!
Menka sɛn? Waka akyerɛ me
na ɔno ara ayɛ.
Me nna nyinaa afiri m’ani so,
me kra awerɛhoɔ no nti.
O AWURADE, ɛno so na nnipa nam tena aseɛ,
na ɛno nkutoo mu na me honhom nkwa wɔ,
ɛnneɛ na ma me ho nsane, na ma mennya nkwa.
Hwɛ, me yiedie nti,
mehunuu amaneɛ pii;
na woayi me kra
afiri ɔsɛeɛ amena mu de afam wo ho,
ɛfiri sɛ wotoo me bɔne nyinaa
guu w’akyi.
Na Asamando rentumi nna wo ase,
na owuo rentumi nkamfo wo.
Wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu no
ntwɛn wo nokorɛ;
ɔteasefoɔ, ɔteasefoɔ, na ɔda wo aseɛ,
sɛdeɛ meyɛ nnɛ yi;
agya ma ne mma nhunu
wo nokorɛ.
AWURADE bɛgye me nkwa,
na yɛbɛbɔ nsankuo
yɛn nkwa nna nyinaa,
wɔ AWURADE fie.

verse.content: Nso Yesaia kaa sɛ wɔmfa borɔdɔma ɛtoa ntare mpɔmpɔ no so, na ɔbɛnya ahoɔden.
Na Hesekia nso bisaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ sɛ mɛkɔ AWURADE fie?

note.content: Ɔrema ɛberɛ asane akɔ n’akyi dɔnhwere du.

verse.content: Ɛberɛ no mu no, Babelhene Merodak-Baladan a ɔyɛ Baladan ba soma maa wɔde nwoma ne ayɛyɛdeɛ brɛɛ Hesekia, ɛfiri sɛ ɔtee sɛ ɔyaree na ne ho ayɛ no den.

Na Hesekia nyaa wɔn ho anigyeɛ, na ɔkyerɛɛ wɔn n’adekoradan, dwetɛ ne sika, ne nnuhwam ne ngo pa, ne n’akodeɛdan nyinaa ne deɛ wɔhunu no n’adekora adan mu nyinaa; biribiara nni ne fie ne n’ahemman mu a Hesekia amfa ankyerɛ wɔn.
Ɛnna Odiyifoɔ Yesaia baa Ɔhene Hesekia nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛn na nnipa yi seɛ, na ɛhe na wɔfiri baa wo nkyɛn yi? Na Hesekia se: Wɔfiri akyirikyiri asase bi so na wɔbaa me nkyɛn, wɔfiri Babel.
Na ɔbisaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wɔahu no wo fie? Na Hesekia se: Deɛ ɛwɔ me fie nyinaa, wɔahunu, biribiara nni m’adekoradan mu a mamfa mankyerɛ wɔn.
Ɛnna Yesaia ka kyerɛɛ Hesekia sɛ: Tie asafo AWURADE asɛm:
Hwɛ, nna bi reba a wɔbɛsoa deɛ ɛwɔ wo fie nyinaa ne deɛ w’agyanom akora de abɛduru nnɛ yi akɔ Babel; biribiara renka, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Na wo ara wo mma a woawo wɔn no mu binom, wɔbɛfa wɔn na wɔakɔyɛ Babel hene aban mu ayitotofoɔ.
Ɛnna Hesekia ka kyerɛɛ Yesaia sɛ: AWURADE asɛm a woaka no, ɛyɛ. Ɛfiri sɛ ɔtee aseɛ sɛ, asomdwoeɛ ne ɔmannwoeɛ bɛba me berɛ so.

block_quote.content: Monkyekyere, monkyekyere me man werɛ!
mo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Monka abodwosɛm nkyerɛ Yerusalem,
na mommɔ no kaseɛ
sɛ n’akodie asa,
sɛ wɔde ne mfomsoɔ akyɛ,
sɛ ne bɔne nyinaa ho
wanya AWURADE nsam mmɔho.
Obi nne team sɛ: Mommɔ AWURADE kwan, wɔ ɛserɛ so,
montene anwea paradada so tempɔn mma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
Wɔbɛma mmonhwa nyinaa so,
na wɔbɛbrɛ mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ nyinaa ase.
Na deɛ ɛyɛ afuafu bɛyɛ asaseta,
na mmonkyimmɔnka ayɛ tonomtonom.
Na AWURADE animuonyam bɛyi ne ho adi,
na honam nyinaa abom ahunu,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ano na aka.
Ɛnne bi se: Team!
Na mebisaa sɛ: Menteam sɛn?
Honam nyinaa yɛ wira,
na ne papa nyinaa te sɛ wiram nhwiren.
Nwira dwan, na nhwiren twam,
na AWURADE home hu fa so.
Ampa, ɔman no yɛ wira.
Nwira dwan, na nhwiren twam,
na yɛn Nyankopɔn asɛm bɛtim hɔ daa.
Foro kɔ bepɔ a ɛkorɔn soɔ,
O, Ɔsɛmpakafoɔ Sion.
Ma wo nne so ahoɔden so,
O Ɔsɛmpakafoɔ Yerusalem.
Ma so, nsuro;
ka kyerɛ Yuda nkuro sɛ:
Hwɛ, mo Nyankopɔn nie!
Hwɛ, AWURADE Nyankopɔn de tumi reba,
na ne basa bɛdi nim ama no.
Hwɛ, n’akatua ka ne ho,
na n’ananmuhyɛ di n’anim.
Ɔbɛyɛne ne nnwankuo sɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ,
ɔbɛturu nnwammaa ne basa so,
na wasoa wɔn ne kokom;
nnwan mmaatan no, ɔbɛka wɔn brɛɛ.
Hwan na ɔde ne nsayam susu nsuo,
na ɔto ɔsoro saama,
na ɔde susukoraa hyɛ asase so mfuturo,
na ɔkari mmepɔ nsania mu
ne nkokoɔ nsania nkoraa mu?
Hwan na ɔtenetene AWURADE honhom,
na ɔfotufoɔ bɛn na ɔmaa no hunuu adeɛ?
Ɔne hwan na atu agyina, na wama no ahunu biribi,
na wakyerɛkyerɛ no atemmuo kwan,
na wakyerɛ no nimdeɛ,
na wama no ahunu nhunumu kwan?
Hwɛ, amanaman te sɛ bokiti ho nsukoko a ɛresosɔ,
na wɔbu wɔn sɛ nsania mu mfuturo bi.
Hwɛ, ɔmema mmepɔ so sɛ mfuturo muhumuhu.
Na Lebanon nnɔɔso mma ɔhyeɛ,
na ne mmoadoma renso ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ.
Amanaman nyinaa nyɛ hwee n’anim;
ɔbu wɔn sɛ adeɛ a ɛnyɛ hwee ne adehunu.
Na hwan ho na mode Onyankopɔn bɛtoɔ,
na suban bɛn na mode bɛsusu no?
Ohoni deɛ, odwumfoɔ na ɔguo,
na sikadwumfoɔ de sika adura ho,
na ɔde dwetɛ ntweaban gugu ho;
deɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ abɔ no no
yi dua a ɛmporɔ;
ɔhwehwɛ odwumfoɔ nyansafoɔ fa,
na wasene ohoni a ɛnkeka ne ho.
Monhunui anaa? Montee anaa?
Wɔmfirii mfitiaseɛ nka nkyerɛɛ mo anaa?
Ɛfiri asase nnyinasoɔ so, montee biribiara asase aseɛ anaa?
Ɔno na ɔte asase kɔntɔnkrɔn soɔ,
na ɛsotenafoɔ te sɛ ntutummɛ;
ɔno na ɔtrɛ soro mu sɛ twamtam,
na ɔyere mu sɛ ntomadan a wɔtena mu;
ɔno na ɔma aberempɔn yɛ sɛdeɛ wɔnyɛ hwee,
ɔdane asase so atemmufoɔ sɛ ahuhudeɛ.
Wɔtɛɛ wɔn ara pɛ, wɔduaa wɔn ara pɛ,
wɔn dua gyee asase mu nhini ara pɛ,
na wahu afa wɔn so ama wɔakusa
na ahum asoa wɔn kɔ sɛ ntɛtɛ.
Na hwan ho na mode me bɛtoɔ
na me ne no asɛ? Ɔkronkronni no na ɔseɛ.
Momma mo ani so nhwɛ soro, na monhwɛ
deɛ ɔbɔɔ yeinom!
Ɔno na ɔbu wɔn dɔm ano yi wɔn adie,
na ɔbobɔ wɔn nyinaa din frɛfrɛ wɔn;
ne tumi dodoɔ ne n’ahoɔden kɛseɛ
nti, obiara nyera.
Adɛn nti na, Yakob, woka,
na Israel, wokasa sɛ:
Me kwan ahunta AWURADE,
na me Nyankopɔn abu n’ani agu m’atemmuo so?
Adɛn wonhunui? Adɛn wonteeɛ?
AWURADE yɛ daa Nyankopɔn,
ɔno na ɔbɔɔ asase awieeɛ no.
Ɔmmrɛ, na ɔmpa aba;
ne nhunumu mu nni ahwehwɛeɛ.
Ɔno na ɔma deɛ wabrɛ tumi,
na ɔma deɛ ɔnni home ahoɔden dɔɔso.
Mmabunu mpo brɛ, na wɔpa aba,
na mmeranteɛ hwehwe ase;
na wɔn a wɔtwɛn AWURADE no deɛ, wɔbɛnya ahoɔden foforɔ,
wɔde ntaban bɛforo sɛ akɔdeɛ,
wɔbɛtu mmirika, na wɔmmrɛ,
wɔbɛnante, na wɔnntɔ piti.
Mpoano aman, mommua mo ano ntie me,
na aman nhyɛ wɔn ho den foforɔ.
Ma wɔmpinkyɛ mmɛkasa,
momma yɛmmom nhyia asɛnniiɛ.
Hwan na ɔnyane deɛ ɔfiri apueeɛ no
a tenenee hyia no baabiara a ɔnam?
Ɔde amanaman gu n’anim,
na ɔde ahemfo hyɛ n’ase.
N’afena ma wɔyɛ sɛ mfuturo,
ne tadua yɛ wɔn sɛ ntɛtɛ a ɛbɔ guo;
ɔti wɔn na ɔtwam sɔnn,
ɔkwan a ne nan nsii so da so.
Hwan na ɔyɛeɛ, na ɔmaa no baeɛ,
na ɔfrɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ firi mfitiaseɛ?
Ɛyɛ me AWURADE a meyɛ kannifoɔ,
na awieeɛ nso, mene ɔno ara.
Nsuano aman hunui, na wɔsuroe,
asase awieeɛ ho popoe;
wɔpinkyɛe na wɔbae.
Oyi boa ne yɔnko,
na oyi ka kyerɛ ne nua sɛ: Hyɛ wo ho den!
Odwumfoɔ hyɛ sikadwumfoɔ den,
deɛ ɔde saeɛ tonomtonom ho yɛ deɛ ɔbɔ tommoɔ soɔ saa ara,
ɔka wɔ ɛsɔ no ho sɛ: Ayɛ yie,
na ɔde nnadewa bobɔ mu na antu.
Na wo, m’akoa Israel,
Yakob a mayi no,
me dɔfo Abraham asefoɔ!
Wo a masɔ wo mu afiri asase ano
na mafrɛ wo afiri n’ahyeɛ so aba,
na maka makyerɛ wo sɛ: M’akoa ne wo,
mayi wo, na merento wo mentwene!
Nsuro, na me ne wo wɔ hɔ,
mma w’akoma nntu, na mene wo Nyankopɔn.
Mehyɛ wo den, nso meboa wo,
nso mede me tenenee nifa mekura wo mu.
Hwɛ, wɔn a wɔn bo afu woɔ nyinaa
ani bɛwu na wɔasopa,
na nnipa a wɔne wo anya no
bɛyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔnyɛ hwee, na wɔayera.
Wɔn a wɔne wo ham no, wobɛhwehwɛ wɔn,
nanso worenhu wɔn;
na wɔn a wɔne wo di ako no
bɛyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔnyɛ hwee, na wɔasa.
Na me, AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn,
mekura wo nifa mu;
me na mese wo sɛ: Nsuro,
me ara mɛboa wo!
Nsuro, aboawa Yakob,
ne mo Israel mma!
Me ara mɛboa wo, AWURADE na ɔkaeɛ,
na wo Gyefoɔ ne Israel Kronkronni no.
Hwɛ, mede wo bɛyɛ ɔporeɛ afidie
nnamnnam, foforɔ, anofanu,
na woapore mmepɔ ayam wɔn dukuduku,
na woayɛ nkokoɔ sɛ ntɛtɛ.
Wobɛhu wɔn so, na mframa asoa akɔ,
na ahum abɔ apete.
Na wo deɛ, wobɛdi AWURADE mu ahurisie
de Israel Kronkronni no ahyehyɛ wo ho.
Mmɔborɔfoɔ ne ahiafoɔ a wɔhwehwɛ nsuo
a ebi nni hɔ na
sukɔm nti wɔn tɛkyerɛma so awoɔ no,
me, AWURADE mɛgye wɔn so,
me, Israel Nyankopɔn, merennya wɔn.
Mɛtue mpampa pradaa so nsuwansuwa
ne mmonhwa mu nsuo aniwa;
mede serɛ so mɛyɛ tadeɛ,
na mede asase pɛsɛɛ mayɛ asutire;
mɛma ntweneduro,
okuo, ohwamma ne ngo nnua aba ɛserɛ so;
mɛma pepeaa, asɛsɛ ne kwabɔhorɔ
abom asisi anwea pradada so,
na nnipa ahunu, ate aseɛ,
de asie akoma mu na wɔadwene ho prɛko sɛ:
AWURADE nsa na ɛyɛɛ yei,
na Israel Kronkronni no na ɔbɔeɛ.
Momfa mo asɛm mmra, AWURADE na ɔseɛ,
mommɛkyerɛ mo nsɛm ase, Yakob hene na ɔseɛ.
Wɔmfa mpinkyɛ mmɛkyerɛ yɛn deɛ ɛbɛba.
Monkyerɛ yɛn akane nnoɔma no sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ,
na yɛnnwene ho nhunu n’awieeɛ,
anaa deɛ ɛbɛba no, momma yɛnte.
Monka deɛ ɛbɛba daakye no nkyerɛ yɛn
na yɛnhunu sɛ anyame ne mo;
aane, monyɛ papa anaa bɔne,
na yɛn ho nnwiri yɛn na yɛnsuro.
Hwɛ, monyɛ hwee,
na mo nneyɛɛ yɛ adehuhuo; akyiwadeɛ ne deɛ ɔfa mo.
Mahwanyan obi afiri atifi fam ama no aba,
awiapuebea na ɔbɛfiri abɔ me din;
na ɔbɛba amradofoɔ so sɛ anwommoɔ so,
na ɔte sɛ ɔnwomfoɔ a ɔwɔ dɔteɛ.
Hwan na ɔfiri mfitiaseɛ kaeɛ, na anka yɛnhunu,
anaasɛ waka ato hɔ, na yɛnka sɛ: Ɔyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ?
Ampa, deɛ ɔkaeɛ nni hɔ, deɛ ɔmaa wɔteeɛ nni hɔ,
deɛ ɔtee mo nsɛm nni hɔ.
Me na medii kan meka mekyerɛɛ Sion sɛ: Hwɛ, wɔn nie:
Na Yerusalem na memaa no ɔsɛmpakafoɔ.
Na mehwɛeɛ, na obiara nni hɔ,
na wɔn mu nso, ɔfotufoɔ nni hɔ
a mebisa a, anka ɔbɛbua me.
Hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa yɛ ɔkwa,
wɔn nneyɛɛ nyɛ hwee;
wɔn guo ahoni yɛ mframa ne ahuhudeɛ.
Hwɛ, m’akoa a mehyɛ no mpamden nie,
deɛ mayi no a me kra ani sɔ no;
mede me honhom magu ne so;
ɔde atemmuo bɛfiri akɔ amanaman mu.
Ɔrenteam na ɔremma ne nne so,
na ɔremma wɔnte ne nne abɔntene so;
demmire a ayɛ mmerɛ no, ɔremmu mu,
na kanea mu asaawa a ɛrefiri wisie no, ɔrennum;
nokorɛ mu na ɔbɛyi atemmuo adie.
N’asɛm ano rennwo, na ɔrempa aba
de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ ɔde atemmuo tenenee bɛsi asase soɔ,
na mpoano aman bɛtwɛn ne mmara.
Sɛ AWURADE Nyankopɔn seɛ nie,
deɛ ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro na ɔtrɛɛ mu,
na ɔyerɛɛ asase ne so afifideɛ nyinaa,
na ɔde ahome ma ɛso nkurɔfoɔ,
na ɔde honhom ma wɔn a wɔnam soɔ no seɛ nie:
Me, AWURADE, mafrɛ wo tenenee mu,
na masɔ wo nsa, na makora wo,
na mede wo mayɛ ɔman apam
ne amanaman hann
sɛ: Bue ani a afira,
yi apokyerɛfoɔ firi afiase
ne wɔn a wɔtete sum mu firi nneduadan mu.
Mene AWURADE, me din ne no,
na meremfa m’animuonyam mma obi,
na m’ayeyie nso, meremfa mma ahoni.
Akane deɛ no, hwɛ, aba mu,
na nnoɔma foforɔ na merekyerɛ,
ɛnnya mfifiriiɛ yi
merema moate.
Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
momfiri asase ano nto n’ayeyie dwom;
mo a mokɔ ɛpo ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa aseɛ,
nsuo ano aman ne wɔn a wɔtete soɔ.
Anwia pradada so ne ɛso nkuro mma wɔn nne so,
nkurowa a Kedar te soɔ no;
ma wɔn a wɔte Sela nto ahurisie dwom,
wɔmfiri mmepɔ atifi mmɔ ahosɛpɛ se.
Ma wɔnhyɛ AWURADE animuonyam,
na wɔnka n’ayeyie nsuo ano aman mu.
AWURADE bɛfiri adi sɛ dɔmmarima,
ɔbɛhwanyan n’abufuo mu sɛ ɔkofoni;
ɔbɛhuro, ɔbɛbɔ ose;
ɔbɛdi n’atamfo so mmaninsɛm.
Mefiri muaa m’ano akyɛ,
mayɛ komm, masianka me ho;
afei mɛbom sɛ ɔwofoɔ a ɔrekyem;
mɛhome foofoo, na magu ahome prɛko.
Mɛma mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ atwintwam,
na mama ɛso nhahan nyinaa adwinnwan;
na madane nsubɔntene nsupɔ,
na mawe ntadeɛ nyinaa.
Na mɛgya anifirafoɔ
wɔ ɔkwan a wɔnnim mu so,
mɛma wɔanante
atempɔn a wɔnnim soɔ so.
Mɛma sum ayɛ hann wɔ wɔn anim,
na deɛ ɛyɛ mmonkyimmɔnka no, mɛyɛ no tamaa.
Adeɛ yei na mɛyɛ mama wɔn,
na merennya wɔn.
Na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho ato abosom soɔ no,
wɔbɛsane wɔn akyi, na wɔn ani bɛwu;
wɔn a wɔka kyerɛ eguo ahoni sɛ:
Mone yɛn anyame no.
Asotifoɔ, montie!
na anifirafoɔ, monhwɛ na monhunu!
Hwan ani na afira sɛ m’akoa,
hwan na n’aso asie sɛ me bɔfoɔ a mesoma no no?
Hwan ani na afira sɛ deɛ ɔwɔ m’asomdwoeɛ apam mu,
hwan na n’ani afira sɛ AWURADE akoa no?
Wahunu nnoɔma pii, nso ɔnhwɛ,
wɔabue n’aso, nso ɔnte asɛm.
AWURADE ani sɔɔ ne tenenee nti,
sɛ ɔbɛma mmara no ayɛ kɛseɛ na anya animuonyam.
Nanso wɔyɛ ɔman a wɔatwa wɔn dwo, afom wɔn afa.
Wɔama wɔakɔka ntokuro mu,
wɔde wɔn ahunta nneduadan mu.
Wɔatwa wɔn dwo a ɔgyefoɔ nni hɔ,
wɔafom wɔn afa a deɛ ɔbɛka sɛ: Dane ma! nni hɔ.
Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛyɛ yei ho aso,
na wawɛn n’aso atie akyire yi?
Hwan na ɔde Yakob maa adwotwa,
na ɔde Israel maa afomfafoɔ?
Ɛnyɛ AWURADE a yɛayɛ no bɔne no,
na wɔampɛ sɛ wɔnante n’akwan mu,
na wɔantie ne mmara no?
Enti na ɔhwiee n’abufuhyeɛ
ne akodie a ano yɛ den no guu ne soɔ,
na ɔsɔɔ ne ho gya hyiaeɛ, nanso wanhunu,
na ɛhyee no, nanso wamfa ansie n’akomam.
Na afei, sɛdeɛ AWURADE a
ɔbɔɔ woɔ, Yakob,
na ɔnwonoo woɔ, O Israel, no ka nie:
Nsuro, na magye wo,
mabɔ wo din mafrɛ wo, woyɛ me dea.
Sɛ woretwa nsuo a, me ne wo na ɛwɔ hɔ,
na sɛ worefa nsubɔntene mu a, ɛremfa wo nkɔ.
Sɛ wonam ogya mu a, ɛrenhye wo,
na ogyaframa renhye wo.
Na me, AWURADE, mene wo Nyankopɔn,
Israel Kronkronni, wo gyefoɔ no.
Mede Misraim ayɛ agyedeɛ ama wo,
mede Etiopia ne Saba asi wo ananmu.
Sɛ wosom boɔ m’ani so,
w’anim aba nyam, na me na madɔ woɔ nti,
mede nnipa bɛma asi wo ananmu,
na mede aman bi asi wo kra ananmu.
Nsuro, na me na me ne wo wɔ hɔ.
Mede w’asefoɔ bɛfiri apueeɛ aba,
na mafiri atɔeɛ maboa wo ano;
mɛka makyerɛ atifi fam sɛ: Fa ma!
Na maka makyerɛ anafoɔ fam sɛ: Mfa nkora!
Fa me mmabanin firi akyirikyiri bra,
ne me mmammaa firi asase ano,
obiara a wɔbɔ me din frɛ no,
na mebɔɔ no memaa m’animuonyam,
menwonoo no na meyɛɛ no no.
Fa ɔman a wɔyɛ anifirafoɔ nanso wɔwɔ ani no firi bra,
ɛne asotifoɔ a wɔwɔ aso no.
Amanaman nyinaa, monhyia faako,
na aman ahodoɔ mmoa ano.
Mo mu hwan na ɔbɛka yei,
na akane nnoɔma no, wakyerɛ yɛn?
Wɔmma wɔn adansefoɔ mmra, na wɔnni bem;
anaa wɔnte, na wɔnka sɛ: Ɛyɛ nokorɛ!
Mone m’adansefoɔ, AWURADE na ɔseɛ,
ne m’akoa a mayi no no,
sɛ monhunu na monnye me nni,
na monhunu mu sɛ me ara mene no.
Wɔnnwonoo onyame bi m’anim,
na m’akyiri nso obiara remma.
Me, mene AWURADE,
na ɔgyefoɔ biara nni hɔ sɛ me!
Me na maka, na magye nkwa, na mama wɔate,
ɛberɛ a na onyame foforɔ bi nni mo mu;
na mone m’adansefoɔ, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Mene Onyankopɔn, na ɛfiri nnɛ nso Mene No,
na obiara nni hɔ a ɔyi firi me nsam;
mɛyɛ adeɛ, na hwan na ɔbɛdane ani?
Sɛ AWURADE,
mo Gyefoɔ, Israel Kronkronni no seɛ nie:
Mo nti mɛsoma akɔ Babel,
na mabubu adaban nyinaa,
na mama Kaldeafoɔ ahurisidie adane adwotwa.
Me, AWURADE, mene mo Kronkronni,
Israel bɔfoɔ, mo hene no.
Saa na AWURADE seɛ,
deɛ ɔma ɛpo mu da ɔkwan
na ɛsa da asuo a ɛyɛ den mu no,
deɛ ɔmaa nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ,
ɛdɔm ne nnɔmmarima firii adie no;
wɔn nyinaa dedae, na wɔansɔre bio,
wɔsae, wɔdunnumii sɛ asaawa.
Monnkae akane nsɛm,
na monnnwene atetedeɛ ho.
Hwɛ, mereyɛ ade foforɔ bi,
afei na ɛrefifire, monhunu?
Mɛbɔ ɛserɛ so kwan,
mɛma nsubɔntene aba anwea pradada so.
Wiram mmoadoma bɛhyɛ me animuonyam,
ɛserɛ so nkraman ne nsohori,
sɛ mama nsuo aba ɛserɛ soɔ na
nsubɔntene aba anwea pradada soɔ,
na mede mama me man a mayi wɔn no anom,
ɔman a manwono wɔn mafa no,
na wɔaka m’ayeyie akyerɛ.
Nanso ɛnyɛ me na wofrɛɛ me, O Yakob,
na me ho ayɛ wo mfone, O Israel!
Woammrɛ me wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ nnwan,
na woamfa w’afɔdeɛ anhyɛ me animuonyam;
mamma woamfa aduane afɔdeɛ ansom me,
na mamma woammrɛ ohwamfufuo ho;
woamfa sika antɔ ahwedeɛ amma me,
na woamma w’afɔdeɛ sradeɛ ammee me,
na mmom wode wo bɔne yɛɛ me adesoa,
na wode w’amumuyɛ maa mebrɛe.
Me, me ara, mene
deɛ ɔpepa wo mmarato, me ara me nti,
na wo bɔne nso, merenkaeɛ.
Kae me ɛ, na yɛmmɛbu atɛn;
ka wo deɛ, na woadi bem.
W’agya a ɔdi kan no ayɛ bɔne,
na wo kasamafoɔ afomfom me,
enti na mahura kronkronbea hɔ mmapɔmma no ho,
na mayi Yakob mama mmusuo, na mede Israel mama adapaabɔfoɔ.
Na afei tie, O m’akoa Yakob
ne Israel a mayi woɔ.
Sɛ AWURADE a ɔyɛɛ woɔ,
na ɔnwonoo wo firii yafunu mu, na ɔbɛboa woɔ no seɛ nie:
Nsuro, m’akoa Yakob,
ne Yesurun a mayi woɔ.
Na mɛhwie nsuo agu asase a sukɔm de no no so,
na nsuwansuwa agu asase pɛsɛɛ so;
mɛhwie me honhom agu w’asefoɔ so,
na me nhyira agu wo mma so.
Na wɔbɛfifi sɛ asuo ho serɛ,
sɛ nsunoa nnuaa, nsutene so.
Oyi bɛse sɛ: Meyɛ AWURADE dea,
na oyi nso de Yakob din afrɛ ne ho;
na oyi nso bɛtwerɛ ne nsa ho sɛ: AWURADE dea,
na ɔde Israel din ato ne ho.
Sɛ AWURADE, Israel hene,
ne ne Gyefoɔ, asafo AWURADE seɛ nie:
Mene odikanfoɔ na mene okyidifoɔ,
na Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ gye me nko.
Hwan na ɔte sɛ me? Ma no nka ɛ! Ma no mpae mu nka
mfa nsi m’anim.
Hwan na ɔfiri tete nteredee kyerɛɛ ɔman a mede bɛsi hɔ daa ne nnoɔma a ɛbɛba no?
Ma wɔnkyerɛ yɛn deɛ ɛbɛba no.
Mommma mo akoma nntu, na monnsuro!
Ɛno ɛmfiri tete nteredee na memaa moteeɛ na mekaeɛ?
Na mone m’adansefoɔ.
Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ sɛ me nko?
Na ɔbotan biara nni hɔ; mennim obiara.

verse.content: Ahoninwomfoɔ nyinaa yɛ ɔkwa, na deɛ wɔn ani gye ho no ho nni mfasoɔ; wɔn ara wɔn adansefoɔ nhunu adeɛ na wɔnnim, enti wɔn ani bɛwu.
Hwan na ɔnwonoo onyame bi na ɔguu ohoni bi a ɛho nni mfasoɔ?
Hwɛ, ne mfɛfoɔ nyinaa ani bɛwu, na adwumfoɔ no nso yɛ nnipa; ma wɔn nyinaa nhyia nnyina hɔ, wɔn ho mpopo, na wɔn ani nwu.
Ɔtomfoɔ se n’adwinnadeɛ yɛ ogya mu adwuma na ɔde asaeɛ bɔ, na ɔde ne basa a ahoɔden wɔ mu yɛ ɛho adwuma; ɛkɔm de no na ahoɔden nni hɔ bio, ɔnnom nsuo a ɔtɔ piti.
Duadwumfoɔ yere homa mu, ɔde pɛnsere sensane ho, ɔde adwinnadeɛ yɛ, na ɔde kɔmpase sensane ho, na ɔyɛ no ɔbarima nsɛso, onipa ahoɔfɛ so, sɛ ɛntena ɛdan mu.
Obi kɔbu tweneduro, anaa ɔyi duaboɔ anaa odum wɔ kwaeɛ mu nnua mu ma no nyini ma no; ɔtɛ sennuro, na osuo ma no nyini;
na ɛyɛ ogya ma onipa, ɔfa ebi to, ɔsɔ bi to paanoo; ebi mpo ɔde yɛ onyame sɔre no. Ɔde sene ohoni koto no.
Ɔde gya hye fa, na ɛfa nso so na ɔtoto nam weɛ, ɔkye so nam di mee; ɔto gya no nso, na ɔse: Wiɛ, me ho ayɛ me hye, mahunu ogya!
Na nkaeɛ no, ɔde yɛ onyame, ne ohoni. Ɔkoto no sɔre no bɔ no mpaeɛ, na ɔse: Gye me, me nyame ne wo!
Wɔnnim na wɔnni nhunumu, na wasram wɔn ani so, na wɔanhunu adeɛ, ne wɔn adwene nso, na wɔante aseɛ;

na obiara nnwene ho, na nimdeɛ biara nni hɔ, na nhunumu biara nni hɔ na wɔaka sɛ: Mahye ɛfa ogya mu, na mato ne nsramma so paanoo, na makye so nam adi; na nkaeɛ no, memfa menyɛ akyiwadeɛ? Dua sini na menkoto no anaa?
Nso na ɔdie; wɔadaadaa n’adwene ama no ato kwan, na ɔntumi nnye ne kra, nso ɔnka sɛ: Ɛnyɛ atorɔ na ɛwɔ me nsa nifa mu yi?

block_quote.content: Kae yeinom, Yakob
ne Israel, na m’akoa ne wo;
me na menwonoo woɔ, woyɛ m’akoa, O Israel.
Me werɛ remfiri wo.
Mapepa wo mmarato sɛ mununkum,
ne wo bɔne sɛ suwisie.
Sane bra me nkyɛn, na magye wo.
Ɔsoro, monto anigyeɛ dwom, na AWURADE na wayɛ;
asase ase nohoa, mommɔ ose,
mompaepae ahurisie dwom mu, mmepɔ,
O kwaeɛ ne emu nnua nyinaa.
Na AWURADE agye Yakob,
na wahyɛ ne ho animuonyam, wɔ Israel mu.
Sɛdeɛ AWURADE, wo Gyefoɔ
ne deɛ ɔnwonoo wo firii yafunu mu no seɛ nie:
Me, AWURADE, mene deɛ ɔyɛɛ ade nyinaa,
deɛ ɔno nko ara twee ɔsoro mu no,
deɛ ɔtrɛɛ asase mu no, na obiara nka me ho;
deɛ ɔma adebisafoɔ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ yɛ ɔkwa,
na ɔma nkɔmhyɛfoɔ yɛ nkwaseafoɔ;
deɛ ɔma anyansafoɔ sane akyire,
na ɔdane wɔn nimdeɛ nkwaseasɛm;
deɛ ɔma n’akoa asɛm gyina,
na ɔma n’abɔfoɔ agyinatusɛm ba mu;
deɛ ɔka Yerusalem ho sɛ: Nnipa bɛtena mu!
ne Yuda nkuro ho sɛ: Wɔbɛkyekyere,
na mɛma n’akurofo so agyinagyina.
Deɛ ɔka kyerɛ ebunu sɛ:
We na mɛma wo nsutene awewe.
Deɛ ɔka Kores ho sɛ: Me dwanhwɛfoɔ nie,
na ɔbɛma me botaeɛ nyinaa aba mu,
na waka Yerusalem ho sɛ: Wɔbɛkyekyere!
ne asɔrefie nso sɛ: Wɔbɛto wo fapem!

verse.content: Saa na AWURADE ka kyerɛ deɛ wasra no Kores,

block_quote.content: deɛ masɔ ne nifa mu sɛ mɛbrɛ amanaman ase n’anim,
na masanesane ahemfo abɔsoɔ,
sɛ mɛbue apono n’anim,
ne nkuro apono,
na wɔantoto mu no:
Mɛdi w’anim,
na mabrɛ mmepɔ ase;
mɛbubu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ apono mu,
na matwitwa dadeɛ adaban mu.
Na mede sum mu akoradeɛ ne
aboɔdenneɛ a ahunta no bɛma wo;
na woahunu sɛ me, AWURADE,
mene deɛ mebɔɔ wo din mefrɛɛ woɔ no,
Israel Nyankopɔn no.
M’akoa Yakob
ne Israel a mayi no nti
na mede wo din mefrɛɛ woɔ,
na mebɔɔ wo abodin no,
nso wonnya nhunuu me.
Mene AWURADE,
na obiara nni hɔ bio;
Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ sɛ me nko.
Me na mebɔ wo abɔsoɔ, nso wonni me,
na wɔahunu afiri awiapueeɛ,
ne atɔeɛ nso, sɛ obiara nni hɔ, gye me.
Mene AWURADE, na obiara nni hɔ bio.
Me na mebɔ hann, na mebɔ sum,
mema asomdwoeɛ, na mede amaneɛ ba.
Me, AWURADE, na meyɛ yeinom nyinaa.
Ɔsoro, momma tenenee mfiri soro nsosɔ,
na ɛmfiri mununkum mu ntɔ;
asase mmue, na ɛmfa ɔgyeɛ mmra,
na ɛmma tenenee nso mfifi mmra:
Me, AWURADE, na mebɔeɛ.
Deɛ ɔne ne Nwomfoɔ ham,
fam nkyɛmferɛ ne ɔnwomfoɔ no nnue!
Dɔteboɔ bisa ne nwomfoɔ sɛ: Woreyɛ deɛn?
Anaa w’adwuma no nni nsa?
Ɔnnue deɛ ɔka kyerɛ agya sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wowoeɛ?
Anaa ɔbaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wokyem woeɛ?
Sɛ AWURADE,
Israel Kronkronni ne ne Yɛfoɔ no seɛ nie:
Mobɛbisa me wɔ nnoɔma a menyɛ
wɔ me mma ho, anaasɛ, mobɛhyɛ me wɔ me nsa ano adwuma ho?
Me na meyɛɛ asase,
na mebɔɔ ɛso nnipa;
me na me nsa trɛɛ ɔsoro mu,
na mehyɛɛ mu asafo nyinaa.
Me na mama ne so tenenee mu,
na mɛtenetene n’akwan nyinaa;
ɔno na ɔbɛkyekyere me kuro,
na ɔbɛgya m’atukɔfoɔ kwan
a ɔrennye tiriadeɛ anaa akyɛdeɛ biara,
asafo AWURADE na ɔka.
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Misraim adwumadeɛ ne Etiopia adwadeɛ a wɔnyaeɛ,
ne Sebafoɔ, mmarima atentene no,
bɛsene aba wo nkyɛn ne wo abɛtena,
wɔbɛdi w’akyi;
nkyehoma mu na wɔbɛsene aba, abɛsɔre woɔ,
na wɔabɔ wo mpaeɛ sɛ:
Ampa, wo mu na Onyankopɔn wɔ, na obiara nni hɔ bio; Onyankopɔn biara nni baabi.
Ampa ara, wone Onyankopɔn a woahunta,
Israel Nyankopɔn, Ɔgyefoɔ no.
Wɔn nyinaa ani bɛwu na wɔn anim agu ase,
ahonidwumfoɔ nyinaa bɛbom ayɛ ahohora.
AWURADE de daa daa nkwagyeɛ
gye Israel;
mo ani renwu, na mo anim rengu ase bio
da biara da.
Na sɛ AWURADE
a ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro
na ɔnwonoo asase na ɔyɛeɛ no seɛ nie,
(ɔne Nyankopɔn),
(ɔno na ɔde sii hɔ);
wammɔ no hunu
na ɔnwonoo no sɛ wɔntena so:
Mene AWURADE, na obiara nni hɔ bio.
Ɛnyɛ ahuntaeɛ mu na mekasaeɛ,
ɛnyɛ sum asase so baabi;
manka mankyerɛ Yakob asefoɔ sɛ:
Monhwehwɛ me basabasa yɛ mu!
Mene AWURADE a mekasa nokorɛ mu,
meka deɛ ɛtenee.
Monhyia mmra,
mommom mpinkyɛ,
mo a moafiri mu afire wɔ amanaman mu.
Wɔnnim de,
wɔn a wɔsoso wɔn ahoni nnua,
na wɔkɔ so ara bɔ onyame
a ɔntumi nnye nkwa mpaeɛ.
Monkasa, monka mo asɛm;
momma wɔmmom ntu agyina.
Hwan na ɔmaa wɔtee yei firi teteete
na ɔka firi tete nteredee?
Ɛnyɛ me, AWURADE a?
Na Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ gye me nko ara,
Onyankopɔn a ɔtene na ɔgye nkwa;
obi nni baabiara gye me nko.
Monnane mo ho mmra me nkyɛn na wɔnnye mo nkwa,
mo asase ano nyinaa.
Na mene Onyankopɔn, na obiara nni hɔ bio.
Maka me ho ntam,
tenenee anomu na asɛm afire,
na ɔrensane, sɛ:
Me na nkotodwe nyinaa bɛkoto me,
na tɛkyerɛma nyinaa aka me ntam.
Wɔbɛka me ho asɛm sɛ, AWURADE mu nko ara
na tenenee ne ahoɔden wɔ;
ne nkyɛn na wɔbɛba,
na wɔn a wɔn bo afu no nyinaa ani bɛwu.
AWURADE mu na Israel asefoɔ nyinaa
bɛdi bem ahyehyɛ wɔn ho.
Bel
butu, Nebo
koto;
akwantuo mmoa ne anantwie soso wɔn ahoni;
wɔakyekyere mo nnesoa
asoasoa mmoa a wɔrebrɛ.
Wɔbom koto butu;
wɔntumi nnsi amanehunu ano;
na wɔn ara nso kɔ atukorɔ mu.
Yakob fie ne Israel fie nkaeɛ nyinaa,
mo a wɔaturu mo afiri yafunu mu
na masoa mo afiri awotwaa mu no,
monyɛ aso mma me.
Na ɛkɔsi w’akwakorabɔ mu, mene me ara,
na ɛkɔsi ɛdwonofuo mu mpo, mede wo bɛsi akɔnkɔn;
me na mayɛ, na me na mɛsoa,
me na mede wo bɛsi akɔnkɔn, na magye wo.
Hwan na mode me bɛto ne ho na ɔne me ayɛ pɛ,
na mode no bɛsusu me, na yɛasɛ?
Wɔn deɛ, wɔhwie sika firi fotoɔ mu,
na wɔde nsania kari dwetɛ;
wɔbɔ sikadwumfoɔ paa na ɔnyɛ no onyame;
wɔkoto, na wɔsɔre no.
Wɔma no so si akɔnkɔn
kɔsoɛ no si ne sibea, na ɛsi hɔ;
ɛntwe ne ho mfiri n’afa;
wɔteam frɛ no a, ɔmmua,
na ɔntumi nnye obi, n’ahohia mu.
Monkae yei, na monnwene ho,
mo mmaratofoɔ, mokae ɛ.
Monkae akane nnoɔma a ɛfiri tete no,
sɛ me ara mene Onyankopɔn, na obiara nni hɔ bio;
mene Onyankopɔn, na deɛ ɔte sɛ me nni hɔ koraa.
Me a mefiri mfitiaseɛ meka awieeɛ asɛm,
na mefiri tete mmerɛ no meka deɛ wɔnyɛeɛ no,
meka sɛ: Me tirimbɔ bɛgyina,
na deɛ ɛsɔ m’ani nyinaa mɛyɛ.
Mɛfrɛ ɔkoropɔn bi afiri apueeɛ
ne m’agyina mu barima afiri akyirikyiri asase so.
Makasa, na mɛma no aba mu;
madwene, na mɛyɛ.
Montie me, asobrakyefoɔ
a mo ne tenenee ntam twe.
Mede me tenenee apinkyɛ, ɛnni akyiri,
na me nkwagyeɛ renka akyi.
Mede nkwagyeɛ bɛsi Sion,
na mede m’animuonyam mama Israel.

note.content: Yei yɛ Babel anyame atitire no mu baako.
Yei ne Bepɔ Nebo a saa berɛ no mu na abɛyɛ deɛ ebinom som.

block_quote.content: Siane, na tena mfuturo mu,
O ababaa, Babel babaa,
tena fam, a ahennwa bi nni hɔ
O Kaldeafoɔ babaa,
na wɔremfrɛ wo
ɔbaabereɛ a ɔkorɔkorɔ ne ho bio.
Fa ayuyammoɔ ne ne ba kɔyam ayuo,
yi wo nkatanimu,
ma wo gyawurusie so, yiyi wo nan ho,
twitwa asuo.
W’adagya bɛda adi,
na wɔahunu w’ahohora.
Mɛtɔ were,
na merenhunu onipa mmɔbɔ.
Yɛn Gyefoɔ no, asafo AWURADE ne ne din,
ne Israel Kronkronni no.
Tena ase dinn, na kɔ sum mu,
O Kaldeafoɔ babaa,
na wɔremfrɛ wo
ahennie ahodoɔ no awuraa bio.
Me bo fuu me man,
meguu m’agyapadeɛ ho fi,
na mede wɔn mehyɛɛ wo nsa,
woanyi ayamhyehyeɛ ankyerɛ wɔn,
nkɔkoraa so mpo womaa wo kɔnnua yɛɛ
duru dodo;
na wokaa sɛ: Mɛyɛ awuraa akɔsi daa;
na amma woamfa yeinom anhyɛ w’akomam,
woankae wɔn awieeɛ.
Na afei tie yei ɛ, ahodɔni
a wote hɔ asomdwoeɛ mu,
wo a wose no w’akoma mu sɛ:
Me ara me ne no, na obiara nni akyire bio,
merentena ase sɛ kunafoɔ,
na merenni mmasugya.
Na nnoɔma mmienu yi bɛba wo so
amonom, da koro,
abawuo ne kunayɛ.
Ɛbɛba wo so ama no aduru pɛ,
wo ntafowayie dodoɔ
ne wo nkaberɛkyekyerɛ a ano yɛ den no nyinaa akyiri.
Wotenaa ase dwodwoo wɔ wo bɔne mu
kaa sɛ: Obi nhu me;
wo nyansa ne wo nimdeɛ bɔɔ w’adwene ko,
maa wokaa no w’akoma mu sɛ:
Me ara me ne no, na obi nni akyire bio.
Na mmusuo bɛto wo
a worenhunu yi;
na abuo bɛbu wo a
worentumi mpata;
na mpofirim na ɔsɛeɛ bɛba wo soɔ,
worenni no hunkan.
Sɔre gyina ɛ, fa wo nkaberɛkyekyerɛ
ne wo ntafowayie dodoɔ
a wofiri wo mmɔfraase brɛɛ mu no,
ebia wobɛtumi de ayɛ biribi,
ebia wode bɛyi hu.
Woabrɛ w’agyinatuo pii no mu;
ma wɔnsɔre nnyina ɛ, na wɔnnye wo nkwa,
ɔsoro ani mu kyekyɛfoɔ no,
nsorommahwɛfoɔ
a ɔsrane foforɔ daa
wɔkyerɛ nnoɔma a ɛbɛba wo soɔ no.
Hwɛ, wɔayɛ sɛ ɛserɛdwaneɛ,
ogya ahye wɔn,
wɔrentumi nnye wɔn kra
mfiri gyaframa no nsam;
ɛnyɛ nsramma a wɔde huahua wɔn ho,
anaasɛ ogya a wɔtena ho.
Saa na wɔn a woabrɛ wɔn ho no bɛyɛ ama woɔ;
wɔn a wo ne wɔn ananteɛ firi wo mmɔfraase no,
wɔbɛyera akɔ wɔn fam;
obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye wo nkwa.
Montie yei, O Yakob fie,
mo a wɔde Israel din ato mo
na mofiri Yuda asene mu no,
mo a mode AWURADE din ka ntam
na mobɔ Israel Nyankopɔn din,
na ɛnyɛ nokorɛ anaa tenenee mu no.
Na wɔde kuro kronkron no frɛ wɔn ho,
na wɔtwere Israel Nyankopɔn
a asafo AWURADE ne ne din no.
Akane nnoɔma no, mefiri mekaeɛ ɛnyɛ nnɛ,
na ɛfirii m’anomu, na mama wɔate;
mpofirim na meyɛeɛ, na ɛbae.
Ɛfiri sɛ menim sɛ woyɛ asoɔden,
na wo kɔn yɛ daban,
na wo moma yɛ yaawa;
enti na meka mekyerɛɛ woɔ akyɛ;
ɛnnya mmaeɛ no, memaa wotee,
na woanka sɛ: M’adwinhoni na ɔyɛeɛ,
me honi a wɔasene ne me guo honi na wɔhyɛeɛ.
Woate; hwɛ yei nyinaa;
na wo nso worenka nkyerɛ?
Merema woate nsɛm foforɔ afiri sɛsɛɛ,
ne deɛ wɔakora a wonhunuiɛ no;
afei na wɔabɔ, na ɛmfiri tete,
na wontee da gye nnɛ,
na woanka sɛ: Hwɛ, menim dada.
Wontee pɛn, nso wonhunui,
ɛfiri tete na w’aso mmueeɛ;
na menim sɛ nkontompo ara na wotwa,
na wɔfrɛ wo mmaratofoɔ firi yafunu mu.
Me din nti na metwentwɛn m’abufuo aseɛ,
na m’ayeyie nti medwoo m’ani memaa wo,
na manku wo.
Hwɛ, manane wo, nso ɛnte sɛ dwetɛ;
masɔ wo mahwɛ wɔ amaneɛ fononoo mu.
Me nti, me nti na meyɛ;
ɛfiri sɛ wɔngu me din ho fi sɛn?
Meremfa m’animuonyam memma obi.
Tie me, O Yakob,
ne Israel a mafrɛ woɔ,
mene ɔno ara, mene odikanfoɔ,
na me ara nso ne okyidifoɔ.
Nso me nsa na ɛhyɛɛ asase aseɛ,
na me nsa nifa de ɔsoro trɛɛ hɔ;
sɛ mefrɛ wɔn a,
wɔn nyinaa bɛgyinagyina hɔ.
Mo nyinaa mommoaboa mo ano ntie:
Wɔn mu hwan na ɔkaa yeinom?
Deɛ AWURADE dɔ no no
bɛyɛ n’anisɔdeɛ wɔ Babel ho,
na ne basa atia Kaldeafoɔ.
Me, me na maka, nso mafrɛ no.
Mama no aba, na ne kwan yɛ no siadeɛ kwan.
Montwe mpini me, montie yei.
Ɛnyɛ ahuntaeɛ mu na mefiri mfitiaseɛ mekasaeɛ;
ɛfiri berɛ a ɛbaeɛ no, na mewɔ hɔ,
na afei AWURADE Nyankopɔn asoma me ne ne honhom.
Sɛ AWURADE,
wo Gyefoɔ, Israel Kronkronni no seɛ nie:
Mene AWURADE, wo Nyankopɔn,
mene deɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛ wo deɛ ɛyɛ ma woɔ,
na ɔgya wo kɔ ɔkwan a fa soɔ no soɔ.
Sɛ wowɛn w’aso ma me mmara nsɛm ɛ,
anka w’asomdwoeɛ bɛyɛ sɛ asubɔnten,
na wo tenenee ayɛ sɛ ɛpo asorɔkyeɛ,
na w’asefoɔ adɔre sɛ anwea,
na w’asefoɔ ayɛ sɛ n’aboseaa.
Wɔrentwa wɔn din ntwene,
na wɔrensɛe no mfiri m’anim.
Momfiri Babel, momfa ahurisidie nne nnwane mfiri Kaldeafoɔ mu.
Monka, momma wɔnte yei,
momma no mfiri nkɔduru asase ano.
Monka sɛ: AWURADE agye n’akoa Yakob.
Ɔde wɔn nam anwea pradada soɔ no, sukɔm anne wɔn;
ɔtuee nsuo firii ɔbotan mu maa wɔn,
ɔpaee ɔbotan mu maa nsuo senee.
Asomdwoeɛ nni hɔ mma abɔnefoɔ, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Montie me, mpoano aman,
na monyɛ aso, akyirikyiri aman.
AWURADE afrɛ me afiri yafunu mu,
ɛfiri me na yam na ɔtoo me din.
Na ɔyɛɛ m’ano sɛ afena nnamnnam,
ne nsa ase nwunu mu na ɔde me sieeɛ,
na ɔde me yɛɛ agyan a ano yɛ nnam,
ɔde me siee ne kotokuo mu.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: M’akoa ne wo,
Israel a mɛnya wo mu animuonyam.
Na me deɛ, mekaa sɛ:
Mabrɛ magu, masɛe m’ahoɔden ama adehunu ne ahuhudeɛ,
nanso m’atemmuo wɔ AWURADE nkyɛn,
na m’adwuma so adeɛ wɔ me Nyankopɔn nsam.
Na afei AWURADE se,
deɛ ɔnwonoo me firii yafunu mu sɛ memmɛyɛ no akoa,
na mensane Yakob memmra ne nkyɛn,
na memmoa Israel ano memmrɛ no no,
ɛfiri sɛ m’anim aba nyam, AWURADE anim,
na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ m’ahoɔden,
ɔse:
Ɛyɛ hare sɛ wobɛyɛ m’akoa
na woama Yakob mmusuakuo soɔ,
na wode Israel mu wɔn a wɔakora wɔn no asane aba;
na mede wo bɛyɛ amanaman hann,
na woayɛ me nkwagyeɛ akɔduru asase ano.
Saa na AWURADE,
Israel Gyefoɔ, ne Kronkronni no ka
kyerɛ deɛ wɔbu ne kra animtia, deɛ aman kyiri no,
deɛ ɔyɛ nhyɛsofoɔ akoa no sɛ:
Ahemfo bɛhunu, na wɔasɔresɔre,
asafohene nso, na wɔakoto asɔre,
ɛsiane AWURADE a ɔyɛ nokwafoɔ,
Israel Kronkronni a wayi woɔ no nti.
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Anisɔ berɛ mu na matie woɔ,
na nkwagyeɛ da mu na maboa woɔ,
na mɛkora wo, na mede wo
mayɛ ɔman apam, sɛ:
Ma asase no so si hɔ,
na ma wɔmfa agyapadeɛ a ayɛ afo no nni so bio;
na ka kyerɛ nneduafoɔ sɛ: Momfiri adi!
ne wɔn a wɔwɔ sum mu no sɛ: Mompue!
Akwan so na wɔbɛdidie,
na mpampa pataa nyinaa so bɛyɛ wɔn adidibea;
ɛkɔm renne wɔn, na sukɔm renne wɔn,
na kumaforoteɛ ne owia renka wɔn,
na deɛ ɔhu wɔn mmɔborɔ no bɛgya wɔn,
na wakyerɛ wɔn mmasuo so kwan.
Na mereyɛ me mmepɔ nyinaa akwan,
na m’atempɔn akorɔn.
Hwɛ, yeinom firi akyirikyiri bɛba,
na hwɛ, yeinom firi atifi fam ne atɔeɛ fam,
na yeinom nso firi Sinifoɔ asase so.
Ɔsoro, monto dwom, na asase, di ahurisie!
mmepɔ nso, momfrɛ nserehehe dwom!
Na AWURADE akyekyere ne man werɛ,
na wahunu ne mmɔborɔfoɔ mmɔbɔ!
Na Sion kaa sɛ: AWURADE agya me,
na AWURADE werɛ afiri me.
Ɔbaa werɛ bɛfiri ne ba akɔkoaa,
na ne yam renhyehye no ne yafumma ho anaa?
Sɛ yeinom werɛ bɛfiri mpo a,
me deɛ, me werɛ remfiri wo.
Hwɛ, mede wo makurukyire me nsayam;
w’afasuo sisi m’anim daa.
Wo nkuro kyekyerefoɔ ho bɛyɛ hare asene w’adwirifoɔ,
na w’asɛefoɔ bɛfiri wo mu akɔ.
Ma w’ani so hwɛ wo ho hyia,
yeinom nyinaa rehyia aba wo nkyɛn.
Sɛ mete aseɛ yie, AWURADE na ɔseɛ,
wobɛhyɛ wɔn nyinaa sɛ ahyehyɛdeɛ,
na wode wɔn abɔ abɔsoɔ, sɛ ayeforɔ.
Na w’amamfo ne wo nkuro a asɛeɛ
ne w’afasusini asase no,
afei wobɛyɛ hihiaa a wɔn a wɔbɛtena soɔ no rensene,
na wɔn a wɔmene woɔ akɔ akyirikyiri.
Na mma a wɔwoo wɔn wɔ w’amanehunu mu no
bɛka no w’aso mu sɛ:
Afa ha yɛ hihiaa ma me,
pini do, na mennya tenabea.
Na wobɛka no w’akoma mu sɛ:
Hwan na ɔwoo yeinom maa me?
Na me deɛ, mma bɔɔ me, na meyɛɛ obonini,
wɔtuu me kɔe,
na wɔsunsum me; na yeinom deɛ,
hwan na ɔyɛnee wɔn?
Hwɛ, me deɛ, ɛkaa me nko,
ɛno mu no na yeinom wɔ he?
Sɛ AWURADE Nyankopɔn seɛ nie:
Hwɛ, mɛma me nsa so makyerɛ amanaman,
na masi me frankaa mama aman,
na wɔaturu wo mmabanin, wɔn kokom,
na wo mmammaa nso, wɔasi wɔn akɔnkɔn aba.
Na ahemfo bɛyɛ wo mmagyegyefoɔ,
na wɔn ahemmaa ayɛ wo nufomafoɔ;
wɔde wɔn anim bɛbutubutu fam ama wo,
na wɔatafere wo nan ase mfuturo,
na woahunu sɛ me, mene AWURADE
a wɔn a wɔn ani da me soɔ no ani renwuo.
Wɔgye dɔmmarima nsam adeɛ a wafa,
anaasɛ ɔhene tirimuɔdenfoɔ nnommum bɛfiri ne nsa?
Na sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Dɔmmarima nnommum mpo, wɔbɛgye,
deɛ ne ho yɛ hu nso adeɛ a wafa bɛfiri mu afi,
na me ara mene deɛ ɔne wo ham no bɛham,
na me ara mɛgye wo mma nkwa.
Na mɛma w’ahafoɔ adi wɔn ara wɔn nam,
na wɔn mogya abo wɔn sɛ nsamono,
na honam nyinaa ahunu
sɛ me AWURADE, mene wo Gyefoɔ,
ne wo dimafoɔ ne Yakob tumfoɔ no.
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Ɛhe ara na mo na awaregyaeɛ nwoma
a mede megyaee no no wɔ?
Anaasɛ m’akafoɔ mu hwan
na metɔn mo memaa no?
Hwɛ, mo amumuyɛ nti na wɔatɔn mo,
na mo mmarato nti na wɔagyae mo na.
Adɛn nti na mebaeɛ no, na obiara nni hɔ,
mefrɛeɛ no, obiara annye soɔ?
Me nsa yɛ tiaa sɛ mentumi mennyeɛ,
anaasɛ tumi a mede bɛgye nkwa bi nni me mu?
Hwɛ, mede me nkaanim mema ɛpo we,
mema nsubɔntene danedane anwea pradada so
nsuo a ɛnni hɔ nti, emu nam porɔporɔ,
na sukɔm kuku wɔn.
Mede tumm mekata ɔsoro,
na mede ayitoma meyɛ ne nkataho.
AWURADE Nyankopɔn ama me
asuafoɔ tɛkyerɛma,
sɛ menhunu sɛdeɛ mede asɛm
bɛwowa deɛ wabrɛ;
ɔnyane me daa anɔpa,
ɔbue m’aso ma me, sɛ memfa mentie sɛ asuafoɔ.
AWURADE Nyankopɔn abue m’aso,
na me nso mante atua
mansane m’akyi.
Medanee m’akyi memaa mmaakafoɔ,
ne m’afono nso, memaa enwi tutufoɔ.
Manyi m’ani
mamfiri ahohoradeɛ ne ntasuo ho.
Na AWURADE Nyankopɔn bɛboa me,
enti na ahohora amfa me soɔ;
enti na mayɛ m’anim sɛ twerɛboɔ,
na menim sɛ m’ani renwu.
Deɛ ɔbu me bem no abɛn,
hwan na ɔne me bɛdi asie?
Ɔmma yɛnnyina nhyiam.
Hwan na ɔne me anya?
Ma no mpinkyɛ me.
Hwɛ, AWURADE Nyankopɔn bɛboa me,
hwan ne deɛ ɔbɛbu me fɔ?
Hwɛ, wɔn nyinaa bɛsu sɛ atadeɛ,
nweweboaa bɛwe wɔn.
Mo mu hwan na ɔsuro AWURADE,
na ɔtie n’akoa asɛm?
Deɛ ɔnam sum mu
na hann bi nhyerɛn mma no no,
ma no mfa ne ho nto AWURADE din so,
na ɔntwere ne Nyankopɔn.
Hwɛ, mo a mososɔ ogya
na mode nnyentia a ɛdɛreɛ mia no nyinaa,
monkɔ mo gya no dɛre
ne nnyentia a moasosɔ no mu.
Me nsam na yei bɛfiri ayɛ mo,
ɛyea mu na mobɛdeda fam.
Montie me, mo a modi tenenee akyire
na mohwehwɛ AWURADE no,
monhwɛ ɔbotan a wɔpaee mo firii mu
ne abopaebea a wɔtuu mo firii mu no,
monhwɛ mo agya Abraham
ne Sara a ɔkyem mo woo mo no,
sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbaakofoɔ na mefrɛɛ no,
na mehyiraa no memaa no dɔree.
Na AWURADE rekyekyere Sion werɛ,
ɔkyekyere n’amamfo nyinaa werɛ,
na wadane ne serɛ so sɛ Eden,
ne n’anwea pradada sɛ AWURADE turom,
wɔbɛhunu mu ahosɛpɛ ne anigyeɛ,
aseda ne dwontoɔ.
Me nkurɔfoɔ, montie me,
na me man, monyɛ aso mma me,
na mmara bɛfiri me nkyɛn akɔ,
na mama m’atemmuo atim hɔ ayɛ aman hann.
Me tenenee reba ntɛm,
me nkwagyeɛ afiri adi,
na m’abasa bɛbu aman atɛn;
me so na nsuano aman ani da,
na me basa na wɔtwɛn.
Momma mo ani so nkɔ soro,
na monhwɛ asase ɛfam,
na ɔsoro bɛyera sɛ wisie,
na asase asu sɛ atadeɛ,
na ɛsofoɔ awuwu sɛ anwansena,
na me nkwagyeɛ bɛtena hɔ daa,
na me nkwagyeɛ rensa da.
Montie me, mo a monim tenenee,
ɔman a me mmara wɔ wɔn akoma mu,
monnsuro ɔdasani ahohorabɔ,
na mommma wɔn ahiyie nnyɛ mo ahopopoɔ,
na nweweboaa bɛwe wɔn sɛ atadeɛ,
na abubummabaa awe wɔn sɛ kuntu;
na me tenenee bɛtena hɔ akɔsi daa,
na me nkwagyeɛ afa awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
AWURADE basa,
nyane ɛ, nyane ɛ! Hyɛ ahoɔden!
Nyane sɛ akane nna no mu,
teteete awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu.
Ɛnyɛ wone deɛ ɔtwitwaa Rahab
na ɔhwiree asuboa kɛseɛ no mu no?
Ɛnyɛ wone deɛ ɔmaa po weeɛ no,
ebunu kɛseɛ mu nsuo no;
deɛ ɔde po ase yɛɛ kwan
maa wɔn a wɔagye wɔn sɛ wɔntwa no?
Na wɔn a AWURADE agye wɔn no bɛsane,
na wɔde ahurisie aba Sion,
na daa anigyeɛ bɛtena wɔn atifi;
ahosɛpɛ ne anigyeɛ bɛka wɔn nsa,
na awerɛhoɔ ne apinisie adwane.
Me ara mene mo werɛkyekyefoɔ;
hwan ne wo na wosuro ɔdasani a ɔwuo
ne onipa ba a wɔyɛɛ no sɛ wira?
Na wo werɛ afiri AWURADE a ɔyɛɛ woɔ
na ɔtrɛɛ ɔsoro mu
na ɔhyɛɛ asase ase no,
na wo ho popo daa daa nyinaa,
ɔhodwanfoɔ abufuo nti
sɛdeɛ ɔresiesie ne ho abɛsɛe biribie,
na ɛhe na ɔhodwanfoɔ abufuo no wɔ?
Wɔbɛyɛ ntɛm ayi mpokyerɛni,
na ɔrenwu nkɔ Amena mu,
na n’aduane remmɔ no.
Na mene AWURADE, wo Nyankopɔn,
a ɔhwanyan ɛpo ma n’asorɔkyeɛ yɛ huu no,
asafo AWURADE ne ne din.
Na mede me nsɛm mahyɛ w’anomu,
na mede me nsa ase nwunu makata wo so,
na matrɛ ɔsoro mu
na mato asase fapem,
na maka makyerɛ Sion sɛ: Me man ne wo.
Nyane ɛ, nyane ɛ!
Sɔre ɛ, O Yerusalem,
wo a woanom AWURADE nsam
n’abufuo kuruwa no;
ntintantɔ kuruwa no
na woanom ahwe mu.
Wannya ne mma a ɔwoo wɔn nyinaa mu
biara ankɔgya no,
na wannya ne mma a ɔyɛnee wɔn nyinaa mu
biara amma no ansɔ ne nsa.
Nnoɔma mmienu yi na ɛtoo woɔ,
hwan na ɔbɛgyam woɔ?
Ɔsɛeɛ ne bubuo ne ɛkɔm ne afena;
mɛkyekyere wo werɛ sɛn?
Wo mma totɔɔ piti
boaboaa hɔ mmorɔno nyinaa ntweaso
sɛ ɔforoteɛ a ɔda fidie mu,
na AWURADE abufuhyeɛ,
wo Nyankopɔn animka, ayɛ wɔn amaama.
Enti tie yei ɛ, mmɔborɔni,
wo a woaborɔ, nanso ɛnyɛ nsa.
Sɛ wo Wura, AWURADE
ne wo Nyankopɔn a ɔdi ma ne man no seɛ nie:
Hwɛ, megye wo nsam
ntintantɔ kuruwa no,
m’abufuhyeɛ kuruwa no,
worenkɔ so nnom bio.
Na mede mahyɛ w’ahafoɔ no nsa,
wɔn a wɔka kyerɛɛ wo sɛ:
Koto, na yɛmfa wo so;
na wode w’akyiri too hɔ sɛ fam
anaasɛ kwan maa wɔn sɛ wɔmfa so.
O Sion, nyane ɛ, nyane ɛ!
hyɛ w’ahoɔden!
O Yerusalem, kuro kronkron,
hyɛ w’animuonyam atadeɛ!
na momonotoni ne deɛ ne ho nteɛ biara
renkɔ so nhyɛne wo mu bio.
Yerusalem, sɔre porepore wo ho mfuturo gu!
O Yerusalem a wɔafa wo dommum;
Sion babaa a wɔafa wo dommum,
sanesane wo kɔn mu nkyehoma!

verse.content: Na sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Wɔantɔn mo annye hwee, na ɛnyɛ sika na wɔde bɛgye mo.
Na sɛ AWURADE Nyankopɔn ka nie: Me man siane kɔɔ Misraim akane no kɔyɛɛ hɔ ahɔhoɔ, na Asiria nso hyɛɛ wɔn so kwa.
Na afei, ɛdeɛn na mewɔ meyɛ no ha, AWURADE asɛm nie, na wɔafa me man kwa yi? Wɔn a wɔdi wɔn soɔ no twa adwo, AWURADE asɛm nie, na wɔka me din ho abususɛm daa daa nyinaa.
Saa nti me man bɛhunu me din, saa nti da no ara wɔbɛhunu sɛ me ara mene deɛ ɔka sɛ: Menie.

block_quote.content: Sɛdeɛ obi a ɔnam mmepɔ soɔ ka asɛmpa no
nan si yɛ fɛ fa!
Ɔno na ɔka asomdwoeɛsɛm, ɔka papa ho asɛmpa,
ɔma wɔte nkwagyeɛ asɛm,
na ɔka kyerɛ Sion sɛ: Wo Nyankopɔn di hene!
Tie! w’awɛmfoɔ bom ma wɔn nne so
to ahurisie dwom;
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn ani tua
AWURADE sɛ ɔresane aba Sion.
Yerusalem amamfo,
mommom nto anigyeɛ dwom,
na AWURADE akyekyere ne man werɛ,
wagye Yerusalem.
AWURADE ayi ne basa kronkron no ho,
amanaman nyinaa anim,
na asase ano nyinaa ahunu
yɛn Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.
Montwe mo ho, montwe mo ho mfiri hɔ nkɔ,
monnka adeɛ a ɛho nteɛ;
momfiri adi mfiri ne mu, monte mo ho,
mo a mosoa AWURADE nnwinneɛ no.
Na ɛnyɛ ɛherɛ so na mobɛfiri adie,
na ɛnyɛ dwane so na mobɛnanteɛ,
na AWURADE redi mo anim,
na Israel Nyankopɔn abɔ mo kyidɔm.
Hwɛ, m’akoa bɛdi yie,
wɔbɛpagya, na wɔama no so
na wakorɔn sɛ.
Sɛdeɛ ne ho yɛɛ nnipa pii ahodwirie no,
ɛsiane sɛ n’anim asɛe a ɛnte sɛ onipa deɛ,
na ne nipaban nte sɛ nnipa mma deɛ bio no nti,
saa ara na ɔbɛma amanaman pii abobɔ pirie,
na ahemfo amuamua wɔn ano wɔ ne ho,
ɛfiri sɛ deɛ wɔnka nkyerɛɛ wɔn no, wɔhunu,
na deɛ wɔntee da no, wɔte aseɛ.
Hwan na wagye yɛn asɛnka no adie,
na AWURADE basa no, hwan so na ada adie ama no ahunu?
Na ɔfifirii sɛ duforɔ n’anim,
sɛ asase pɛsɛɛ mu nhini;
ɔnni esu anaa animuonyam a ɛbɛma yɛahwɛ no,
na ɔnni ahoɔfɛ a ɛbɛma yɛn ani agye ne ho.
Wɔbuu no animtia, na nnipa poo no,
ɔyɛ onipa a ɔhunuu ayayadeɛ na ɔnim yadeɛ,
na wɔbuu no animtia sɛ obi a nnipa yi wɔn ani hunta no,
na yɛammu no hwee.
Ampa, yɛn nyarewa no, ɔno na wafa,
na yɛn ayayadeɛ nso, wasoa;
na yɛn deɛ, yɛbuu no sɛ deɛ wɔahwe no,
deɛ Onyankopɔn aka no de no ahyɛ amaneɛ mu.
Na ɔno deɛ, yɛn mmarato nti na wɔpiraa no,
yɛn amumuyɛ nti na wɔdwerɛɛ no;
yɛn asomdwoeɛ ho asotwe daa ne so,
na ne mmaa ntampeɛ na wɔde asa yɛn yadeɛ.
Yɛn nyinaa wowɔɔ ntwɛtwɛdɛ sɛ nnwan,
yɛdanedanee fefaa yɛn akwan so,
na AWURADE maa yɛn nyinaa
amumuyɛ kɔhwee ne so.
Wɔhyɛɛ no aniɛyaa na wɔpiraa no,
nanso ɔno deɛ wammue n’ano,
sɛ adwammaa a wɔde no rekɔ akɔkum no,
sɛ odwanten a watɔ ne ho nwitwitwafoɔ anim mum no,
saa no wammue n’ano.
Wɔde ahodwan ne atemmuo yii no kɔe;
ne berɛsofoɔ nso, hwan na ɔdwenee ho sɛ
wɔahwim no afiri ateasefoɔ asase so korɔ,
na me man mmarato nti na wɔbobɔɔ no?
Na wɔmaa ne damena fraa abɔnefoɔ
ne ɔdefoɔ deɛ mu wɔ ne wuo mu,
nanso wanni abɔnefosɛm,
na nnaadaa nni n’anomu.
Na ɛyɛɛ AWURADE pɛ sɛ ɔdwerɛ no;
na ɔbɔɔ no yadeɛ.
Sɛ ɔnya de ne kra to hɔ yɛ asodie afɔdeɛ a,
ɔbɛhunu asefoɔ, ne nna bɛware,
na deɛ ɛyɛ AWURADE pɛ bɛyɛ yie wɔ ne nsam.
Ɔbɛhunu ne kra brɛ no ho adeɛ amee.
Ne hunu mu na m’akoa teneneeni no
bɛnya tenenee ama nnipa pii,
na ɔno ara afa wɔn amumuyɛ nso asoa.
Saa nti mɛkyɛ adeɛ mu mama no nnipa bebree mu
na ɔne ahoɔdenfoɔ akyɛ asadeɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔde ne kra too hɔ maa owuo,
na wɔabu no afra mmaratofoɔ mu,
nso ɔno na wasoa nnipa bebree bɔne,
na wadi ama mmaratofoɔ.
To dwom, wo bonini a woanwoɔ;
to anigyeɛ dwom na fa ahosan team,
wo a wonkyem mma!
Na onnibie mma bɛdɔɔso
asene deɛ ɔwɔ kunu mma, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Ma wo ntomadan mu ntrɛ,
na wɔntwe wo tenabea ho nkataho no mu, nnodo ho.
Ma wo ntampehoma nware,
na ma wo mpɛɛwa ntintim.
Na wobɛtrɛtrɛ akɔ nifa ne benkum,
na w’asefoɔ afa amanaman no,
na woama wɔatenatena nkurofo so.
Nsuro, na w’ani renwu,
nsi wo tiri ase, na w’anim renkusa,
na wo werɛ bɛfiri wo mmabaaberɛ mu aniwuo,
na wo kunayɛ ahohora no, worenkae bio.
Na wo Yɛfoɔ ne wo kunu,
asafo AWURADE ne ne din,
na wo Gyefoɔ, Israel Kronkronni no,
wɔfrɛ no asase nyinaa Nyankopɔn.
Na AWURADE afrɛ wo
sɛ ɔbaa a wɔagyaa no na ɔredi honhom mu yea,
sɛ mmeranteberɛ mu yerɛ a wɔapa no,
wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Megyaa wo ɛberɛ tiawa bi,
nanso ayamhyehyeɛ kɛseɛ na mede bɛboa w’ano.
Abufuo mmorosoɔ mu
na mede m’ani mehuntaa wo kakraa bi,
nanso mede daa adɔeɛ bɛhu wo mmɔbɔ,
wo Gyefoɔ AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Na yei yɛ me sɛ Noa nna no:
Sɛdeɛ mekaa ntam sɛ
Noa nsuo no mmfa asase so bio no,
saa ara nso na maka ntam sɛ me bo remfu wo
na merenteatea wo bio.
Na mmepɔ bɛtwe akɔ
na nkokoɔ atutu,
na m’adɔeɛ deɛ, ɛrentwe mfiri wo so,
na m’asomdwoeɛ apam no rentutu,
AWURADE a ne yam hyehye no ma woɔ no na ɔseɛ.
O mmɔborɔni a ahum bɔɔ woɔ a wɔnkyekyeree wo werɛ,
hwɛ, me ara mede w’aboɔ bɛtoto anintɔnka adubire mu,
na mede hoa aboɔ mato wo fapem,
na mede bogya aboɔ mayeyɛ w’abantifi,
na mede nsramma aboɔ mayɛ w’aponkɛseɛ,
ne w’afasuo nyinaa aboɔ afɛfɛ.
Na wo mma nyinaa bɛyɛ AWURADE asuafoɔ,
na wo mma asomdwoeɛ bɛdɔɔso.
Tenenee mu na w’ase bɛtim;
wo ne nhyɛsoɔ ntam bɛtwe, na worensuro,
na wo ne ahudeɛ nso ntam bɛtwe, na ɛremmɛn wo.
Hwɛ, wɔpɛ wo ntɔkwa,
nso ɛmfiri me;
deɛ ɔsuae wo soɔ no,
wo nti ɔbɛhwe ase.
Hwɛ, me na mebɔɔ ɔtomfoɔ
a ɔfite gyabidie mu na ɔbɔ akodeɛ sɛdeɛ ne dwuma teɛ,
na me ara na mebɔɔ ɔsɛefoɔ sɛ ɔnsɛeɛ.
Akodeɛ biara a wɔbɔ tia woɔ renyɛ yie,
na tɛkyerɛma biara a ɛbɛsɔre atia wo atemmuo mu no, wobɛbu no fɔ;
ɛno ne AWURADE nkoa agyapadeɛ
ne wɔn tenenee a ɛfiri me no, AWURADE asɛm nie.
Mommra oo, mo a sukɔm de mo nyinaa,
mommra nsuo ho,
na mo a monni sika no,
mommra mmɛtɔ, na monni.
Mommra mmɛtɔ nsa ne nufosuo;
ɛnyɛ sika na wɔde tɔ, na ɛnni boɔ nso.
Adɛn na mokari sika gye deɛ ɛnyɛ aduane,
ne mo brɛ so adeɛ tɔ deɛ ɛmmee mo?
Montie me ɛ, monni nnepa,
na sradeduane nyɛ mo kra dɛ.
Monyɛ aso ɛ, na mommra me nkyɛn,
montie, na mo kra nnya nkwa.
Na me ne mo bɛpam daa apam,
Dawid adɔeɛyɛdeɛ a ɛsi hɔ pintinn no.
Hwɛ, mede no mayɛ aman danseni,
aman safohene ne mmarahyɛni.
Hwɛ, wobɛfrɛ ɔman a wonni wɔn aba,
na aman a wɔnni woɔ no de mmirika bɛba wo nkyɛn,
AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nti ne Israel Kronkronni no nti,
ɛfiri sɛ wahyɛ wo animuonyam.
Monhwehwɛ AWURADE, berɛ a ɔma wɔhu no no,
momfrɛ no berɛ a ɔbɛn no.
Ma ɔbɔnefoɔ nnane ne kwan nnya,
na onipa huhuo nnane n’adwene nnya,
na ɔnsane mmra AWURADE nkyɛn, na ne yam bɛhyehye no ama no,
ne yɛn Nyankopɔn no nkyɛn, na ne fakyɛ a ɔde bɛkyɛ dɔɔso.
Na ɛnyɛ m’adwene ne mo adwene,
na ɛnyɛ mo akwan ne m’akwan, AWURADE asɛm nie;
na sɛdeɛ ɔsoro korɔn sene asase no,
saa ara na m’akwan korɔn sene mo akwan,
na m’adwene nso sene mo adwene.
Na sɛdeɛ osuo ne sukyerɛmma firi soro gu fam
na ɛnsane nkɔ hɔ bio, gye sɛ ɛfɔ asase ansa
ma no ba aduane na ɛso aba,
na ɛde aba ma ogufoɔ ne aduane ma odifoɔ no,
saa ara na m’asɛm a ɛfiri m’anomu bɛyɛ:
Ɛrensane mma me nkyɛn kwa,
na mmom gye sɛ ɛyɛ deɛ mepɛ
na ɛwie deɛ enti a mesomaa no no.
Na anigyeɛ na mode bɛfiri akorɔ,
na wɔde asomdwoeɛ agya mo kwan.
Mo nti mmepɔ ne nkokoɔ bɛto anigyeɛ dwom prɛko pɛ,
na wiram nnua nyinaa abobɔ wɔn nsam.
Pepeaa bɛfifiri asi nkasɛɛ ananmu,
na ohwamdua bɛfifiri akraateɛ ananmu;
na ɛbɛyɛ din ama AWURADE
ne daa nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a wɔrentwa ntwene.
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Monni atemmuo so, na monyɛ adetenenee,
na me nkwagyeɛ reyɛ aba,
na wɔrebɛyi me nkwagyeɛ adi.
Nhyira ne ɔdasani a ɔyɛ yei,
ne onipa ba a ɔkura mu no,
deɛ ɔdi homeda a ɔngu ho fi
na ɔhwɛ ne nsa na anyɛ bɔne biara no.
Na ɔnanani a ɔde ne ho abɛbata AWURADE ho no, mma no nnka sɛ:
Tuo na AWURADE bɛtu me afiri ne man mu;
na mma ayitotoni nso nnka sɛ:
Hwɛ, me deɛ, meyɛ duawuiɛ.
Na sɛ AWURADE ka nie:
Ayitotofoɔ a wɔdi me homeda
na wɔyi adeɛ a ɛsɔ m’ani
na wɔkura m’apam mu no,
mɛma wɔn me fie ne m’afasuo mu
nkaeɛ dum ne din
a ɛyɛ sene mmabanin ne mmammaa;
daa din a wɔrentwa ntwene
na mede bɛma wɔn.
Na ananafoɔ a wɔabɛbata AWURADE ho sɛ
wɔresom no, na wɔadɔ AWURADE din,
na wɔabɛyɛ no nkoa no,
obiara a ɔdi homeda a ɔngu ho fi, ne wɔn a
wɔkura n’apam mu no,
mede wɔn bɛba me bepɔ kronkron no so,
na mama wɔn ani agye me mpaebɔ fie,
wɔn hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne wɔn kum afɔdeɛ
bɛsɔ m’ani, m’afɔrebukyia so;
na me fie no, wɔbɛfrɛ no mpaebɔ fie
ama aman nyinaa.
AWURADE Nyankopɔn
a ɔboa Israel adamfikyi ano no asɛm nie:
Mɛkɔ so maboa nnipa ano mapae
wɔn a wɔaboa wɔn ano no so.
Wiram mmoadoma nyinaa, mommra mmɛdidi hamham,
kwaeɛ mu mmoadoma nyinaa.
N’awɛmfoɔ yɛ anifirafoɔ,
wɔn nyinaa nnim de;
wɔn nyinaa yɛ akraman mum,
wɔntumi mmobɔ mu;
wɔyɛ nnamukasafoɔ, deda hɔ, pɛ nna.
Na akraman no yɛ adufudepɛfoɔ sɛ,
wɔnnim ɔmeeɛ.
Nnwanhwɛfoɔ no nso nni nhunumu,
wɔn nyinaa adanedane wɔn ani akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn akwan so,
obiara hwehwɛ ne mfasoɔ, obiara biara.
Wɔka sɛ: Mommra, momma yɛnkɔ nkɔfa nsa,
na yɛnwe nsaden,
na ɔkyena bɛyɛ sɛ nnɛ,
ɛbɛso aboro so pii.

verse.content: Ɔteneneeni yera,

block_quote.content: na obiara mfa nhyɛ n’akoma mu,
na wɔfa mmarima pa kɔ,
a obiara nteaseɛ,
sɛ bɔne a ɛbɛba no anim na wɔyi teneneeni no firi korɔ.
Ɔkɔ asomdwoeɛ mu;
wɔhome wɔn nnaeɛ so,
wɔn a wɔnante wɔn teeyɛ mu no.
Na mo deɛ, montwe mmra ha,
ɔbaabayifoɔ mma,
ɔwaresɛefoɔ ne odwamamfoɔ asefoɔ.
Hwan ho na mogorɔ?
Hwan so na motrɛtrɛ mo anomu
na motwe mo tɛkyerɛma mu yi?
Ɛno, ɛnyɛ mmarato ne
atorofoɔ mma ne mo anaa?
Mo a mo ani so yɛ hyeɛ abosonnua no ho,
nnua frɔmfrɔm nyinaa ase,
na mokunkumm mo mmɔfra asubonhwa mu,
abotan mpaepaeɛ ase!
Asubonhwa mu aboɔ torotoro mu na wo kyɛfa wɔ,
ɛno, ɛno ne wo kyɛfa,
nso ɛno so na wohwiee ahwiesa
na wode ayɛyɛdeɛ guiɛ,
yeinom so na me bo bɛdwo anaa?
Bepɔ sorɔnsorɔn a ɛkorɔn so
na wotoo wo mpa,
ɛhɔ ara nso na woforo kɔ kɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ;
na wode wo nkaeɛ adeɛ no
sii ɛpono ne aponnwa mu,
na wofirii m’akyi
kɔyii wo nnaeɛ so foroe,
na wobaee mu,
na wo ne wɔn dii deɛ wobɛgye wɔn no ano,
wopɛɛ wɔne wo nna
na wohunuu wɔn adagya mu.
Na wode ngo tuu kwan de kɔmaa Molek,
na womaa wo nnuhwam dɔɔso,
na wosomaa w’abɔfoɔ akyirikyiri,
na wobrɛɛ wo ho ase kɔɔ Asamando.
Wo kwan tentene no nti wobrɛe,
nanso woanka sɛ: Mfasoɔ biara nni so;
wonyaa wo nsam akwanhosan nti,
anyɛ wo ya.
Na hwan nti na w’akoma tuiɛ na wosuroeɛ,
na wodii atorɔ,
na woankae me
amfa anhyɛ w’akoma mu yi?
Me deɛ, ɛnyɛ komm a mefiri tete mayɛ
nti na wonsuro me yi anaa?
Mɛka wo tenenee ne wo nneyɛɛ makyerɛ,
nso ɛrenyɛ wo mfasoɔ biara.
Woteam a, ma w’abosompem a woaprapra aboa ano no nnye wo.
Na mframa bɛsoa wɔn nyinaa akɔ,
ohuo bɛfa wɔn kɔ;
na deɛ ɔdwane bɛtoa me no bɛnya asase no adi,
na wanya me bepɔ kronkron no atena so.
Na wɔbɛka sɛ:
Montu ngu so, montu ngu so, mommɔ kwan,
monyi akwansideɛ mfiri me man kwan mu.
Na sɛ deɛ ɔkorɔn na wɔama no soɔ,
deɛ ɔte hɔ daa na ne din yɛ kronkron no seɛ nie:
Mete soro ne deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ kronkron,
ne deɛ wabubuo na ne honhom brɛ aseɛ no nkyɛn nso,
sɛ mɛma ahobrɛasefoɔ honhom anya nkwa,
na mama wɔn a wɔabubu wɔn no akoma anya nkwa.
Na merenham menkɔsi daa,
na me bo remfu daa,
ɛfiri sɛ honhom no firi me hɔ,
na me na mayɛ ahome.
N’anibereɛ a ɛyɛ amumuyɛ nti na me bo fuiɛ
na mehwee no, mehuntae, na me bo fui;
nanso ɔkɔɔ so sanee n’akyi faa n’akoma kwan so.
Mahunu n’akwan, nso mɛsa no yadeɛ;
na mɛkyerɛ no kwan, na masane makyekyere ne werɛ,
na mabɔ anofafa so aba ama n’abooboodifoɔ.
Asomdwoeɛ, asomdwoeɛ nka deɛ ɔwɔ akyirikyiri ne deɛ ɔbɛn, AWURADE na ɔseɛ,
na mɛsa no yadeɛ.
Na abɔnefoɔ te sɛ ɛpo a ɛhuru kukukuku;
na ɛntumi nyɛ komm,
na emu nsuo pu atɛkyɛ ne dɔteɛ gu.
Asomdwoeɛ nni hɔ mma abɔnefoɔ, me Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Team denden, nnodo ho;
ma wo nne so sɛ totorobɛnto,
na ka me man mmarato ne Yakob fie bɔne kyerɛ wɔn.
Ɛwom, wɔhwehwɛ me da biara,
na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhunu m’akwan,
sɛ gyama wɔyɛ ɔman bi a wɔdi asɛntenenee
na wɔnnyaa wɔn Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ no;
wɔbisa me hɔ asɛntenenee,
wɔpɛ sɛ wɔpinkyɛ Onyankopɔn.
Wɔka sɛ: Adɛn nti na yɛdi mmuada na wonhunu,
yɛbrɛ yɛn kra ase na wonnim yi?
Hwɛ, mo abuada da no,
moyɛ deɛ mo ara mopɛ,
na moteetee mo adwumayɛfoɔ nyinaa.
Hwɛ, ɔham ne ntɔkwa mu na mode di mmuada,
na mobɔ kuturuku atirimuɔden so.
Ɛnyɛ mo nnɛ yi mmuada yi na ɛbɛma wɔate mo nne wɔ soro.
Sɛdeɛ mmuada a mɛpɛ no
ɛda a onipa brɛ ne kra ase no teɛ nie?
Sɛ obi si ne tiri ase sɛ mmɛwa
na ɔsɛ ayitoma ne nso da so a,
yei na wofrɛ no abuadadie
ne da a ɛsɔ AWURADE ani yi anaa?
Ɛnyɛ yei ne abuadadie a mepɛ?
Sɛ mobɛsanesane abɔnefoɔ apɔ,
ahotiri kɔnnua nhoma,
ama wɔn a wɔhom wɔn soɔ no afa wɔn ho akɔdie,
na moabubu kɔnnua nyinaa?
Ɛnyɛ yei nso: Sɛ wobubu wo paanoo ma deɛ ɛkɔm de no di bi,
na wode mmɔborɔfoɔ, adamfikyi, ba wo fie,
sɛ wohunu dagyani a, wokata ne ho,
na womfa wo ho nhunta wo honam mu nnipa?
Ɛno na wo hann bɛpue sɛ adekyeeɛ,
na w’akwahosan afefɛ ntɛm.
Wo tenenee bɛdi w’anim,
na AWURADE animuonyam abɔ wo kyidɔm.
Ɛno na wobɛfrɛ, na AWURADE bɛbua,
wobɛteam, na ɔbɛka sɛ: Menie.
Sɛ woyi kɔnnua firi wo mu,
nsateaa tene ne ahuhukasa,
na wode deɛ wo kra pɛ ma deɛ ɛkɔm de no,
na woma ɔkra a ɔyɛ mmɔborɔ no mee a,
ɛno deɛ wo hann bɛpue sum mu,
na wo kusuu bɛyɛ sɛ awia ketee.
Na AWURADE bɛkyerɛ wo kwan daa nyinaa,
na ɔde nnepa amee wo kra,
na wahyɛ wo nnompe mu den,
na woayɛ sɛ turo a nsuo sene wɔ mu ne nsuo aniwa a emu nsuo nni hwammɔ.
Na wo mufoɔ bɛkyekyere tete akurofo,
wobɛma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ ahodoɔ fapem agyina,
na wɔafrɛ wo ɔpamago,
deɛ ɔtoto akwan sɛ nnipa ntena hɔ.
Sɛ wosianka wo nan homeda
na me da kronkron no woanyɛ deɛ wo pɛ,
na wofrɛ me homeda sɛ anigyedeɛ,
ne AWURADE da kronkron no sɛ da a ɛsɛ anidie,
na wodi no ni na woamfa wo ara w’akwan so,
na woanyɛ deɛ wo ara wo pɛ, na woankeka nsɛm hunu a,
ɛnna w’ani bɛgye AWURADE ho,
na mɛma woafa asase so sorɔnsorɔnbea so,
na mɛma woadi w’agya Yakob agyapadeɛ no,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ano na aka.
Hwɛ, AWURADE nsa nyɛ tiaa a ɛnso ɔgyeɛ,
na n’aso mu nyɛ den a ɛrente asɛm,
na mmom mo amumuyɛ ne deɛ ɛma
mo ne mo Nyankopɔn ntam ateteɛ,
na mo bɔne na akata n’ani afiri mo ho
a enti ɔntie.
Na mogya akeka mo nsam,
na amumuyɛ agu mo nsateaa ho fi;
mo ano keka atorosɛm,
mo tɛkyerɛma woro nkontompo.
Obiara nsaman asɛntenenee so,
na obiara nsaman wɔ nokorɛ asɛm ho.
Wɔde wɔn ho to nsɛnhunu so, na wɔka nsɛnhuhuo;
wɔnyinsɛn bɔne, na wɔwo mmusuo.
Wɔhwane ɔkyerebene nkosua,
na wɔnwono ananse ntentan;
deɛ ɔdi wɔn nkosua wu,
na wɔtia bi so a, ɛpae ahuritia.
Wɔn ntentan no renyɛ atadeɛ,
na nnipa remfa deɛ wɔyɛ no nkata wɔn ho;
Wɔn nnwuma yɛ abusudwuma,
na akakabensɛm wɔ wɔn nsam.
Wɔn nan tutu mmirika kɔyɛ bɔne,
na wɔyɛ ntɛm kɔhwie mogya a ɛdi bem gu;
wɔn adwene yɛ abusudwene,
ɔsɛeɛ ne obubuo wɔ wɔn atempɔn ho.
Asomdwoeɛ kwan deɛ, wɔnnim,
na atɛntenenee nni wɔn akwan mu;
wɔayɛ wɔn akwan nkontonkyi,
obiara a ɔfa soɔ nnim asomdwoeɛ.
Enti na atemmuo ne yɛn ntam awareɛ,
na tenenee nso nto yɛn no;
yɛtwɛn hann, na hwɛ, esum nie,
ne ɔhyerɛn nso, na sum kabii mu na yɛnam.
Yɛkeka ɔfasuo ho sɛ anifirafoɔ,
na yɛkeka sɛ wɔn a wɔnni ani;
yɛsunti awia ketee sɛ kusuu mu,
yɛhinhim ahoɔdenfoɔ mu sɛ awufoɔ.
Yɛn nyinaa pɔ so sɛ asisire,
na yɛsi apini sɛ mmuburo;
yɛtwɛn atemmuo nso ebi nni hɔ,
ne nkwagyeɛ, na ɛne yɛn ntam ware.
Na yɛn mmarato dɔɔso w’anim,
na yɛn bɔne di adanseɛ tia yɛn;
na yɛn mmarato da yɛn anim,
na yɛn amumuyɛ nso, yɛnim.
Yɛato AWURADE mmara atwa no nkontompo,
na yɛapa yɛn Nyankopɔn akyi;
yɛkasa nhyɛsoɔ ne atuateɛ kasa,
yɛsusu atorosɛm wɔ akoma mu na yɛka.
Na wɔadane atemmuo ani,
na tenenee akɔgyina akyirikyiri;
na nokorɛ ahwe ase edwam,
na deɛ ɛtene ntumi mma mu.
Na nokorɛ ayɛ adeɛ a ɛho yɛ na,
na deɛ ɔtwe ne ho firi bɔne ho no, wɔfom no fa.
Na AWURADE hunui, na ansɔ n’ani
sɛ atemmuo biara nni hɔ,
na ɔhunuu sɛ ɔbarima biara nni hɔ,
na ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa sɛ ɔkamafoɔ biara nni hɔ;
ɛnna ne basa gyee no,
na ne tenenee wowaa no.
Na ɔhyɛɛ tenenee sɛ nkataboɔ,
na nkwagyeɛ dadeɛ kyɛ hyɛɛ ne ti,
na ɔhyɛɛ aweretɔ atadeɛ kataa ne ho,
na ɔfiraa aweretɔ sɛ ntoma.
Sɛ wɔyɛeɛ no, saa ara na ɔbɛhyɛ wɔn ananmu
de abufuhyeɛ ama n’ahohiahiafoɔ, ne akatua ama n’atamfo;
nsuano aman nso, ɔde akatua bɛhyɛ wɔn ananmu.
Na wɔbɛsuro AWURADE din afiri atɔeɛ,
ne n’animuonyam afiri owia puebea,
na ɔbɛba sɛ asuo a ano yɛ den
a AWURADE ahum de reba.
Na ɔbɛba sɛ Ɔgyefoɔ ama Sion ne Yakob mu wɔn a wɔsane firi mmarato mu no, AWURADE asɛm nie.

verse.content: Na me deɛ, yei ne me ne wɔn apam no, AWURADE na ɔseɛ: Me honhom a ɛwɔ wo soɔ no ne me nsɛm a mede mahyɛ w’anomu no, ɛremfiri w’anomu ne w’asefoɔ anomu ne w’asefoɔ asefoɔ anomu, AWURADE na ɔseɛ, ɛfiri sesɛɛ de bɛkɔ akɔsi daa.

block_quote.content: Sɔre, hyerɛn, na wo hann aba,
na AWURADE animuonyam apue wo so.
Na hwɛ, esum bɛkata asase so,
na esum kabii akata aman so;
nanso AWURADE bɛpue wo so
na n’animuonyam abɛda adi wo so.
Na amanaman bɛnante aba wo hann no ho, na ahemfo aba hyerɛn a apue wo soɔ no ho.
Ma w’ani so hwɛ wo ho hyia, na hwɛ;
wɔn nyinaa aboa ano reba wo nkyɛn;
wo mmabanin firi akyirikyiri reba,
na wo mmammaa nso, wɔturu wɔn wɔn nkyɛn mu reba.
Ɛno na wobɛhunu, na w’anim ate,
w’akoma de ahosɛpɛ bɛdi ahurisie,
ɛfiri sɛ ɛpo ahonyadeɛ dodoɔ redane abɛyɛ wo deɛ,
amanaman ahodeɛ reba wo nkyɛn.
Yoma manyamanya bɛkata wo so,
Midian ne Efa yomaforɔ no.
Wɔn nyinaa firi Seba reba,
sika ne ohwamfufuo na wɔsoso,
na wɔbɛka AWURADE ayeyie.
Wɔbɛboa Kedar nnwankuo nyinaa ano abrɛ wo,
Nebaiot adwennini bɛsom wo;
wɔde anisɔ bɛforo m’afɔrebukyia,
na mɛhyɛ m’animuonyam fie no animuonyam.
Hwannom ne yeinom a wɔtu sɛ mununkum,
ne mmuburo a wɔba wɔn buo mu yi?
Aane, me na mpoano aman bɛtwɛn me,
na Tarsis ahyɛn na ɛbɛdi kan,
na wɔde wo mma firi akyirikyiri aba
a wɔn dwetɛ ne wɔn sika ka wɔn ho,
wɔde rebrɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn din,
ne Israel Kronkronni no,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na wahyɛ wo animuonyam.
Na ananafoɔ bɛto w’afasuo,
na wɔn ahemfo asom wo;
na m’abufuo mu na mehwee woɔ,
na m’adɔeɛyɛ mu na mahu wo mmɔbɔ.
Na wo kuro apono ano bɛda hɔ daa,
wɔrentoto mu awia ne anadwo,
na nkurɔfoɔ de amanaman ahonyadeɛ abrɛ wo
a wɔn ahemfo di wɔn anim.
Na ɔman ne ahennie a ɛrensom woɔ no bɛgu,
na saa aman no, sɛeɛ na wɔbɛsɛe wɔn pasaa.
Lebanon animuonyam bɛba wo nkyɛn,
ne pepeaa, sɛsɛ ne kwabɔhorɔ
bɛbom ahyehyɛ me kronkronbea hɔ;
na mɛhyɛ me nantiabea animuonyam.
Na wo nhyɛsofoɔ mma
de akotoakotoɔ bɛba wo nkyɛn,
na wɔn a wɔbuu wo animtia nyinaa
bɛba abɛbum wo nan ase,
na wɔafrɛ wo AWURADE Kuro,
Israel Kronkronni no Sion.
Deɛ anka wɔgya woɔ na wɔtane woɔ
na obiara biara mfa wo mu no,
mɛma wo ayɛ kɛseyɛ
na mayɛ wo awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ anigyedeɛ.
Na wobɛnum amanaman nufoɔ,
na woanum ahemfo mpokua;
na woahunu sɛ me, AWURADE, mene w’agyenkwa
ne wo Gyefoɔ, Yakob Tumfoɔ no.
Kɔbere ananmu na mede sika bɛsi maba,
na dadeɛ ananmu na mede dwetɛ bɛsi maba,
na kɔbere mfrafraeɛ asi nnua ananmu,
na dadeɛ asi aboɔ ananmu.
Na mɛma asomdwoeɛ adi wo so panin ahwɛ wo,
na mede tenenee mayɛ wo kafoɔ.
Wɔrente nhyɛsoɔ nka w’asase so bio,
wɔrente ɔsɛeɛ ne bubuo nka w’ahyeɛ mu;
na wobɛfrɛ w’afasuo Nkwagyeɛ,
ne wo kuro apono nso Ayeyie.
Ɛnyɛ owia na
ɛbɛyɛ wo hann awia bio,
na ɔhyerɛn nso, ɛnyɛ ɔsrane
na ɛbɛharan ama wo anadwo,
na mmom AWURADE na ɔbɛyɛ wo daa hann,
na wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ w’animuonyam.
Wo wia rentɔ bio,
na wo srane nso renwu,
na AWURADE bɛyɛ wo daa hann,
na w’abooboodie nna awie sa.
Na wo man deɛ, wɔn nyinaa bɛyɛ teneneefoɔ,
wɔbɛdi asase no so akɔsi daa;
wɔbɛyɛ me tɛdua duban a afefɛ,
me nsa ano adwuma a ɛhyɛ me animuonyam.
Deɛ ɔsua koraa no bɛdane abusua,
na akumaa koraa adane ɔman a ɛyɛ den.
Me, AWURADE,
mɛyɛ no ntɛm ne berɛ mu.
AWURADE Nyankopɔn honhom wɔ me so,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE asra me ngo
sɛ menka asɛmpa menkyerɛ amanehunufoɔ;
wasoma me sɛ memmɛkyekyere wɔn a wɔn akoma abubuo werɛ,
mempae ahofadie menkyerɛ nnommum
ne nneduadan bue menkyerɛ apokyerɛfoɔ,
na mempae AWURADE anisɔ afe
ne yɛn Nyankopɔn aweretɔ da no,
menkyekyere abooboodifoɔ nyinaa werɛ,
menhyehyɛ Sion abooboodifoɔ
memma wɔnnɛnso nsi nso mu da ananmu,
memma wɔn anika ngo nsi abooboo ananmu,
memma wɔn ayeyie ntadeɛ nsi honhom a watɔ bera ananmu,
na wɔmfrɛ wɔn tenenee nnua,
AWURADE tɛ nnua a ɛhyɛ no animuonyam.
Na wɔbɛkyekyere tete akurofo
ama akanefoɔ amamfo so agyina,
na wɔayɛ nkuro agoago
ne awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ amamfo no foforɔ.
Na ahɔhoɔ bɛgyina ahwɛ mo nnwan,
na ananafoɔ ayeyɛ mo akuafoɔ ne mo turoyɛfoɔ.
Na mo deɛ, wɔbɛfrɛ mo AWURADE asɔfoɔ,
na wɔase mo sɛ: Yɛn Nyankopɔn asomfo;
mobɛdi amanaman ahonyadeɛ,
na wɔn adedodoɔ mu na mobɛhoahoa mo ho.
Mo aniwuo no ananmu mobɛnya mmɔho,
na ahohora ananmu mobɛdi mo kyɛfa ho ahurisie;
ɛno nti mobɛnya mmɔho, mo asase so,
daa anigyeɛ bɛyɛ mo dea.
Na me, AWURADE, medɔ atemmuo,
mekyiri atirimuɔden ne adwotwa,
na mɛtua wɔn ka nokorɛ mu,
na me ne wɔn apam daa apam.
Na wɔbɛhunu wɔn asefoɔ, amanaman mu,
ne wɔn mma wɔ aman mu;
obiara a n’ani bɔ wɔn soɔ no bɛhu wɔn sɛ
wɔyɛ ɔman a AWURADE ahyira wɔn.
AWURADE mu na me ho sɛpɛ me,
na me Nyankopɔn mu na me kra di ahurisie,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔde nkwagyeɛ atadeɛ ahyɛ me,
ɔde tenenee batakari asi me,
sɛ ayeforɔkunu a ɔkeka ne ho bɔ n’abotire,
ne ayeforɔ a ɔde ne nnwinneɛ hyehyɛ ne ho.
Na sɛdeɛ asase ma afifideɛ pue
na turo ma deɛ wɔadua mu fifire no,
saa ara na AWURADE Nyankopɔn bɛma tenenee ne ayeyie
afifiri amanaman nyinaa anim.
Sion nti meremmua m’ano,
na Yerusalem nti merenyɛ komm,
de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ ne tenenee bepue sɛdeɛ adekyeeɛ haran,
na ne nkwagyeɛ adɛre sɛ tɛnee.
Na amanaman bɛhunu wo bembuo,
na ahemfo nyinaa ahunu w’animuonyam,
na wɔato wo din foforɔ
a AWURADE ano bɛkyerɛ no.
Na wobɛyɛ ahokeka abotire, AWURADE nsa mu
ne ɔhene abotitene, wo Nyankopɔn nsam.
Wɔremfrɛ wo sɛ: Deɛ wɔagya no, bio,
na w’asase nso, wɔrense no sɛ: Afo, bio,
na mmom wɔbɛfrɛ wo sɛ: Hefsiba,
ne w’asase nso sɛ: Beula,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ani sɔ wo,
na w’asase nso, wɔbɛware no.
Na sɛdeɛ aberanteɛ ware ababaa no,
sɛ wo mma bɛware woɔ ne no.
Sɛdeɛ ayeforɔkunu ho sɛpɛ no ayeforɔ ho no,
saa ara nso na wo Nyankopɔn ho bɛsɛpɛ no wo ho.
W’afasuo so, O Yerusalem,
na mede awɛmfoɔ maduadua.
Adekyeeɛ nyinaa ne anadwo nyinaa daa,
wɔremmua wɔn ano;
mo a mokae AWURADE no,
monnyɛ komm koraa.
Na mommma no nnye n’ahome
kɔsi sɛ ɔbɛtoto Yerusalem
ama no asi hɔ ayɛ ayeyie wɔ asase soɔ.
AWURADE aka ne nifa ne
ne tumi basa ho ntam sɛ:
Meremfa w’ayuo memma
w’atamfo nni bio,
na ananafoɔ mma rennom wo nsa
a wobrɛɛ ho no.
Na wɔn a wɔboa ano na wɔbɛdi
ayi AWURADE ayɛ,
na wɔn a wɔde ba efie no bɛnom,
wɔ me kronkronbea abannwa so.
Monsene, monsene mfa kuro apono no mu,
mommɔ ɔman no kwan;
montu ngu so, montu ngu so nyɛ no tempɔn,
montase so aboɔ;
monsi aman no so frankaa.
Hwɛ, AWURADE ama wɔate
akɔduru asase awieeɛ nohoa sɛ:
Monka nkyerɛ Sion babaa sɛ:
Hwɛ, wo nkwagyeɛ reba;
hwɛ, n’akatua ka ne ho,
na n’ananmuhyɛ di n’anim.
Na wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn sɛ ɔman kronkron,
wɔn a AWURADE agye wɔn,
na wo nso, wɔbɛfrɛ wo Deɛ wɔahwehwɛ n’akyiri kwan,
kuro a wɔannyaa no.
Hwan ne oyi a ɔfiri Edom reba,
deɛ ne ntadeɛ bere kɔɔ a ɔfiri Bosra reba yi?
Oyi a wahuhuru wɔ n’aduradeɛ mu,
na ɔkyea, ne tumi kɛseɛ mu yi?
Ɛyɛ me a mereka ahosan akyerɛ,
Otumfoɔ a ɔgye nkwa.
Adɛn na w’aduradeɛ bere sɛɛ,
na wo ntadeɛ te sɛ nsakyi-amena mu tiatiafoɔ deɛ yi?
Nsa-kyi-amena no, me nko na matiatia mu,
na aman sofoɔ mu biara nka me ho;
na matiatia wɔn so m’abufuo mu,
na mewɔɔ wɔn m’abufuhyeɛ mu,
na wɔn mogya abɔ apete me ntadeɛ mu,
na akeka m’aduradeɛ nyinaa mu.
Na aweretɔ da bi wɔ m’akoma mu,
na me gyeɛ afe no aba.
Na mehwɛe, nso na ɔboafoɔ biara nni hɔ;
na ɛyɛɛ me nwanwa sɛ obiara nni hɔ a ɔsɔ mu abia;
enti me ankasa me basa gyee me,
na m’abufuhyeɛ nso sɔɔ me mu abia.
Na metiatiaa aman so, m’abufuo mu,
na memaa wɔboboroe,
m’abufuhyeɛ mu, na megyee wɔn nkwa firii wɔn nsam.
Mɛbɔ AWURADE adɔeɛ a ɛtim hɔ daa,
AWURADE ayeyi no,
sɛdeɛ AWURADE ne yɛn adie no nyinaa,
na maka Israel fie yie pii a ɔde ayɛ wɔn no,
sɛdeɛ n’ayamhyehyeɛ
ne n’adɔeɛyɛ dodoɔ no teɛ no.
Na ɔse: Me man ara ne wɔn,
mma a wɔrenni atorɔ,
na ɔyɛɛ wɔn agyenkwa.
Wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu no, ne ho hiahiaa no,
na n’anim bɔfoɔ no gyee wɔn;
ne dɔ ne ne mmɔborɔhunu mu na ɔgyee wɔn,
na ɔmemaa wɔn so, na ɔsoaa wɔn tete nna no nyinaa.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔtee atua
na wɔhyɛɛ ne Honhom kronkron no yea,
enti ɔdanee wɔn ɔtamfoɔ,
na ɔno ara ne wɔn dii ako.
Ɛnna ɔkaee tete nna
n’akoa Mose berɛ so:
Ɛhe na deɛ ɔyii
nnwan no hwɛfoɔ no firii po mu no wɔ?
Ɛhe na deɛ ɔde ne Honhom kronkron
sii wɔn mu no wɔ?
Deɛ ɔmaa n’animuonyam basa no
dii Mose nifa,
deɛ ɔpaee nsuo mu, wɔn anim
de gyee daa din faeɛ no?
Deɛ ɔmaa wɔfaa ebunu mu
sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ fa anwea pradada so
na wɔanwatire no?
AWURADE honhom maa wɔhomee
sɛ mmoa a wɔsiane kɔ bonhwa mu.
Saa na wokyerɛɛ wo man kwan
de gyee animuonyam din faeɛ.
Brɛ w’ani ase firi soro,
na firi wo kronkronyɛ ne w’animuonyam tenabea hɔ hwɛ.
Ɛhe na wo ninkuntwe ne wo mmaninneɛ no wɔ?
W’ayamhyehyeɛ ne wo mmɔborɔhunu no
afiri me ho.
Na wo ara wone yɛn Agya;
na Abraham nnim yɛn,
na Israel nhu yɛn:
Wo, AWURADE ara ne yɛn Agya,
wo din ne yɛn Gyefoɔ, firi tete nteredee.
O AWURADE, adɛn nti na woma yɛfiri wo kwan so kɔwɔ ntwɛtwɛdɛ,
na wopirim yɛn akoma na yɛansuro woɔ?
Sane bra, wo nkoa nti,
w’agyapadeɛ mmusuakuo no nti.
Wo man kronkron kuraa wo kronkronbea no kakraa bi;
yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ atiatia so.
Yɛadanedane sɛ wɔn a wonnii wɔn so da;
sɛ wɔn a wɔmfaa wo din ntoo wɔn da.
O, sɛ wosunsuane ɔsoro mu siane
na mmepɔ woso w’anim ɛ!
Sɛ ogya sɔ mmaboa
na ogya ma nsuo huru,
na woama w’atamfo ahunu wo din,
na amanaman ho apopo, w’anim!
Woyɛɛ nnoɔma a ɛyɛ hu a na yɛnhwɛɛ; anim no,
wosiane sii fam na mmepɔ wosoo w’anim!
Na ɛfiri tete nteredee wɔntee,
ɛnkɔɔ obi aso mu,
ani nso nhunuu sɛ Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ
a ɔdi ma deɛ n’ani da ne soɔ, gye wo nko.
Wohyia deɛ ɔde anigyeɛ di asɛntenenee,
wɔn a wɔkae wo w’akwan soɔ no.
Hwɛ, wo bo fui, na yɛyɛɛ bɔne;
na ɛno mu na yɛwɔ dadaada yi, na wɔbɛgye yɛn nkwa anaa?
Na yɛn nyinaa ayɛ sɛ deɛ ne ho nteɛ,
na yɛn adetenenee nyinaa te sɛ ntomago afiafi,
na yɛn nyinaa kusa sɛ ahahan,
na yɛn amumuyɛ soa yɛn kɔ sɛ mframa.
Na obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɔ wo din
na ɔkanyan ne ho sɔ wo mu;
na woayi w’ani ahunta yɛn,
na yɛn amumuyɛ nti woama yɛayera.
Na afei, O AWURADE, yɛn Agya ne wo.
Yɛn deɛ, dɔteɛ ne yɛn, na wone yɛn nwomfoɔ,
na wo nsa ano adwuma ne yɛn nyinaa.
O AWURADE, mma wo bo mmfu bebree,
na nkae amumuyɛ nkɔsi daa.
Hwɛ, ma w’ani mmra so ɛ, wo man ne yɛn nyinaa.
Wo nkuro kronkron adane ɛserɛ so,
Sion adane ɛserɛ so.
Yerusalem ayɛ akurofo.
Yɛn kronkronyɛ ne yɛn animuonyam fie
a yɛn agyanom yii wo emu ayɛ no
wɔde gya ahye,
na yɛn anigyebea nyinaa ayɛ amamfo.
Yeinom nyinaa mu wobɛhyɛ wo ho so ara, AWURADE,
wobɛyɛ komm abrɛ yɛn ase koraa?
Medaa me ho so metwɛn wɔn a wɔammisa m’akyiri kwan no;
na wɔn a wɔanhwehwɛ me no, metwɛnee sɛ anka wɔbɛhu me.
Mekaa sɛ: Menie, menie,
mekyerɛɛ ɔman a wammɔ me din no.
Mebaee me nsam daa nyinaa
mekyerɛɛ ɔman asobrakyefoɔ,
wɔn a wɔnam ɔkwan a ɛnyɛ so
di wɔn adwene akyiri no;
ɔman a wɔyi me ahi
wɔ m’anim daa,
wɔbobɔ afɔdeɛ nturo mu,
na wɔhye nnuhwam ntaayaa soɔ;
wɔtenatena adamena mu,
deda nkokoam anadwo,
wɔdi prakonam,
na akyiwadeɛ nkwan wɔ wɔn nkwansɛn mu.
Wɔka sɛ: Twe wo ho,
nka me, na me ho te sene woɔ no.
Yeinom ne me hwene mu wisie,
ogya a ɛdɛre daa nyinaa.
Hwɛ, wɔatwerɛ no wɔ m’anim:
Merenyɛ komm, na mɛtua so ka,
aane, mɛtua so ka agu wɔn kokom.
Mɛka mo amumuyɛdeɛ ne mo agyanom amumuyɛdeɛ abom atua so ka,
AWURADE na ɔseɛ;
ɛfiri sɛ wɔahye aduhwam wɔ mmepɔ soɔ
na wɔasopa me wɔ nkokoɔ soɔ nti,
mɛsusu wɔn akane nneyɛɛ atua so ka.
Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Sɛdeɛ nsa ba bobe aba esia mu a wɔka sɛ: Nsɛe no,
na nhyira wɔ mu, no,
saa ara na me nkoa nti mɛyɛ,
na mansɛe wɔn nyinaa.
Na mɛyi asefoɔ afiri Yakob mu,
ne me bepɔ sodifoɔ afiri Yuda mu,
na wɔn a mayi wɔn no bɛdi so,
na me nkoa atena hɔ.
Na Saron bɛdane nnwankuo adidibea,
na Akor bonhwa no ayɛ anantwie dabea
ama me man a wɔhwehwɛ m’akyiri kwan no.
Na mo a mogya AWURADE
na mo werɛ firi me bepɔ kronkron no
na moto pono ma Siadeɛ bosom
na mohyɛ afrasa nkuruwa amama ma Hyɛberɛ bosom no,
me nso mede mo bɛma afena,
na wɔakum;
ɛfiri sɛ mefrɛe, na moannye so,
mekasae, na moantie,
na moyɛɛ deɛ ɛyɛ m’ani so bɔne,
na deɛ mempɛ na moyiiɛ.
Enti sɛ AWURADE Nyankopɔn seɛ nie:
Hwɛ, me nkoa bɛdidi,
na mo deɛ, mobɛdi kɔm;
hwɛ, me nkoa bɛnom,
na mo deɛ, sukɔm bɛde mo;
hwɛ, me nkoa ani bɛgye,
na mo deɛ, mo ani bɛwu;
hwɛ, me nkoa de akoma pa bɛto ahurisie dwom,
na mo deɛ, mode akoma mu yea bɛteam,
na mode honhom a abubuo asu yɔɔ.
Na mobɛgya mo din de ayɛ ntanka ama wɔn a mayi wɔn,
na AWURADE Nyankopɔn bɛku mo,
na wato ne nkoa din foforɔ,
na ama deɛ ɔhyira ne ho asase no soɔ no
ahyira ne ho wɔ nokorɛdie Nyankopɔn mu;
na deɛ ɔka ntam wɔ asase no soɔ no
de nokorɛdie Nyankopɔn no aka ntam;
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn werɛ bɛfiri akane amanehunu no,
na ahunta afiri m’anim.
Na hwɛ, merebɔ ɔsoro foforɔ
ne asase foforɔ,
na wɔrenkae kane nnoɔma no
na ɛremma adwene mu bio;
na mmom, momma mo ho nsɛpɛ mo na monni ahurisie daa daa,
adeɛ a merebɔ no nti;
na hwɛ, merebɔ Yerusalem ama no ayɛ ahurisidie,
ne ne man, ama no ayɛ ahosɛpɛ.
Na mɛdi Yerusalem ho ahurisie,
na me ho asɛpɛ me me man ho,
na wɔrente esu
ne nteateam wɔ mu bio.
Wɔrenhunu emu
abotafowa a ne nna nware bio,
anaa akɔkoraa a wanwie ne nna die;
na abɔfra bɛdi mfirinhyia ɔha ansa na wawu,
na ɔdebɔneyɛni a wadi mfeɛ ɔha no yɛ deɛ wadome no.
Na wɔbɛsisi adan atena mu,
na wɔayeyɛ bobe nturo adi mu aba.
Wɔrensisi adan mma obi ntena mu,
na wɔrennua mma obi nni,
na me man nna bɛware ayɛ sɛ dua nna,
na wɔn a mayi wɔn yi bɛdi wɔn nsa ano adwuma akyɛre.
Wɔrenyɛ adwumayɛhunu,
na wɔrenwo mma mma mpatuwuo,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn a AWURADE ahyira wɔn no asefoɔ,
wɔne wɔn mma.
Na wɔnnya mfrɛeɛ no, mɛgye so;
wɔda so rekasa no, mɛtie.
Pataku ne odwammaa bɛdidi faako,
na gyata awe wira sɛ nantwie;
na ɔwɔ deɛ, dɔteɛ na ɛbɛyɛ n’aduane;
wɔrempira, na wɔrensɛe adeɛ bio,
wɔ me bepɔ kronkron no nyinaa so,
AWURADE na ɔseɛ.

verse.content: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:

block_quote.content: Ɔsoro yɛ m’adwa,
na asase yɛ me nan ntiasoɔ;
ɛdan bɛn na mobɛsi ama me,
na ɛhe na me homebea wɔ?
Na yeinom nyinaa, me nsa na ɛyɛeɛ,
saa nti yeinom nyinaa yɛ me dea,
AWURADE asɛm nie.
Na deɛ mɛhwɛ no nie:
Deɛ ɔbrɛ ne ho aseɛ, na ne honhom abubuo,
na ne ho popo m’asɛm ano.
Deɛ ɔkum nantwie no te sɛ deɛ ɔkum nipa;
deɛ ɔkum odwan bɔ afɔdeɛ no te sɛ deɛ ɔbu ɔkraman kɔn mu;
deɛ ɔbɔ aduane afɔdeɛ no te sɛ deɛ ɔde prako mogya ba;
deɛ ɔhye ohwamfufuo no te sɛ deɛ ɔhyira ohoni.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔayi wɔn akwan,
na wɔn kra ani sɔ wɔn akyiwadeɛ;
me nso mɛyi amaneɛ bi mama wɔn,
na mede deɛ wɔsuro aba wɔn so,
ɛfiri sɛ mefrɛe, na obiara annye so,
mekasae, na wɔantie,
na wɔyɛɛ m’ani so bɔne,
na deɛ mempɛ no na wɔyiiɛ.
Montie AWURADE asɛm,
mo a n’asɛm nti mo ho popoɔ:
Mo nuanom a wɔtane mo
a me din nti wɔtu mo no
ka sɛ: AWURADE nnya animuonyam
na yɛnhunu mo anigyeɛ;
nanso wɔn na wɔn ani bɛwu.
Montie oo, ɛnne bi firi kuro no mu!
Ɛnne bi firi asɔrefie!
AWURADE a ɔtua n’atamfo nneyɛɛ so ka
no nne!
Ɔnnya nkyemeeɛ no,
na wawo;
awoɔyea nnya nkaa no no,
na wawo ɔbabarima.
Hwan na wate yei bi pɛn?
Hwan na wahunu yei bi da?
Wɔkyem wo asase da koro, anaasɛ wɔwo ɔman prɛko?
Ɛfiri sɛ awoɔ kaa Sion ara pɛ
na ɔwoo ne mma.
Me, mɛma wɔabue awotwaa ano, na meremma wɔnwo?
AWURADE na ɔseɛ.
Anaa, me a mema wɔwoɔ no, mɛsi ano anaa?
Wo Nyankopɔn na ɔseɛ.
Mo ne Yerusalem ani nnye, na monni ne ho ahurisie,
mo a modɔ no nyinaa;
mo ne ne ho nsɛpɛ mo,
mo a modi ne ho abooboo nyinaa;
na moanum
n’awerɛkyekyerɛ nufoɔ amee,
na moafe n’animuonyam mmorosoɔ
ama mo bo atɔ mo yam.
Na sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie:
Hwɛ, merekoa ayiedie mama no, sɛ asubɔnten,
ne amanaman ahonyadeɛ nso, sɛ asutene a ayire,
na moanom. Nkyɛnmu na wɔbɛturu mo,
na wɔagyegye mo anankoroma so.
Sɛ obi na kyekyere ne werɛ no,
saa ara na me nso mɛkyekyere mo werɛ,
na mo werɛ akyekyere wɔ Yerusalem.
Na mobɛhunu na mo akoma ho asɛpɛ no,
na mo nnompe ayɛ hurohuro sɛ wira frɔmfrɔm;
na wɔbɛhunu AWURADE nsa, ne nkoa so,
ne abufuo a emu yɛ den, n’atamfo so.
Na hwɛ, AWURADE de ogya
ne ne nteaseɛnam a ɛte sɛ ahum bɛba,
de abufuhyeɛ abɛtua n’abufuo so ka,
na ɔde gyaframa ayɛ n’ateatea.
Na ogya na AWURADE de bɛbu atɛn,
na ɔde afena ne honam nyinaa adi,
na wɔn a AWURADE bɛhwire wɔn mu bɛdɔɔso.

verse.content: Wɔn a wɔte wɔn ho dwira wɔn ho kɔ nturo mu, na wɔdi ɔbaakofoɔ a ɔdi mfimfini akyire, na wɔdi prakonam ne akyiwadeɛ ne nkura no, wɔbɛbom awie sa, AWURADE asɛm nie.
Na menim wɔn nneyɛɛ ne wɔn adwene, na ɛbɛba sɛ mɛboa amanaman ne kasa ahodoɔ nyinaa ano, na wɔaba abɛhunu m’animuonyam.

Na mɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ wɔn mu, na masoma wɔn mu nnipa a wɔafiri mu afire no akɔ amanaman nkyɛn, Tarsis, Put ne Lud, taduakuntunfoɔ no, Tubal ne Yawan, nsuano aman a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri a wɔntee me nka, na wɔnhunuu m’animuonyam no, na wɔakɔka m’animuonyam amanaman no mu.

Na wɔde mo nuanom nyinaa bɛfiri amanaman no nyinaa mu abɛyɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ ama AWURADE, apɔnkɔ so ne nteaseɛnam mu ne asako mu ne mfunumupɔnkɔ ne yoma so, aba me bepɔ kronkron Yerusalem so, AWURADE na ɔseɛ, sɛdeɛ Israel mma de aduane afɔdeɛ a ɛwɔ adeɛ a emu teɛ mu ba AWURADE fie no.
Na mɛyi wɔn mu binom nso ayɛ asɔfoɔ ne Lewifoɔ, AWURADE na ɔseɛ.

block_quote.content: Na sɛdeɛ ɔsoro foforɔ ne asase foforɔ
a mɛyɛ no
bɛgyina m’anim no, AWURADE asɛm nie,
saa ara na mo asefoɔ ne mo din bɛgyina.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ ɔsrane foforɔ biara
ne homeda biara
honam nyinaa bɛba abɛsɔre m’anim,
AWURADE na ɔseɛ.

verse.content: Na wɔbɛfiri adi akɔhwɛ nnipa a wɔato me mmara no afunu a wɔn mu mmoaa renwu da, na wɔn gya nso rennum da; na wɔbɛyɛ akyiwadeɛ ama honam nyinaa.
